description: InkPad Notepad is the simple, elegant, easy way to keep notes on your phone, or on the web. Once upon a time, you had to write down notes in a paper notepad and carry it around with you. If you wrote a shopping list or to do list, you might go to the store and discover you had forgotten your notepad. But how often do you forget to bring your mobile phone with you? Introducing InkPad, the notepad you’ll only forget as often as your phone! Inkpad Notepad let's you access your notes online at www.InkpadNotepad.com. You can create or edit notes from the convenience of your computer's web browser, and always have access to your notes from your phone when you're offline too. CREATE NOTES InkPad is designed to look like a paper notepad, and is just as simple to use. When you open InkPad, you’ll see a list of all notes you’ve created. To add a new note, tap on the “+” button at the bottom of the screen. The first line of text will automatically be used as the title. CREATE TO DO LIST Create a note as usual, then select the "to do list" button at the top of the note screen. CREATE SHOPPING LIST Create a note as usual, then select the "shopping list" button at the top of the note. EDIT NOTE OR TO DO LIST Now you can write your note. Just like a paper notepad, you don’t have to do anything special to save your notes, they are auto-saved for you. SAVE As mentioned above, notes are auto-saved. You don’t have to do anything special to save them. BACKUP NOTES TO SD CARD By default, notes are backed up to SD card as text files. You can turn this feature off in Notepad Settings. SYNC NOTES ONLINE With version 2.0, Inkpad Notepad now lets you sync/backup notes online. You can access your online notes at www.InkpadNotepad.com by signing in with the same Google account you selected in the mobile app. SEARCH YOUR NOTES OR TO DO LISTS Inkpad Notepad now gives you an option to search your notes or to do lists. From the home screen, tap on the search icon, then begin writing. As you write, the list of notes will be filtered to only display notes containing the search keyword. Press the "X" button to close note search, and view all notes as usual. SHARE NOTES At the bottom of each note is a “share” button. Tapping it brings up all the ways to share. Typical ways include email, SMS, etc. CHANGE NOTE’S TITLE To change a notes title, tap on the title area at the top of that note. DELETE NOTE If you don’t want a note any longer, you can delete it in several ways: 1) Open the note, tap the “delete” button at the bottom of the page. 2) From the main notes screen, long-press the title of a note, then tap on “delete”. REMOVE ADS The free version of InkPad Notepad is ad supported. If you would like to remove the ads and support the continued development of InkPad Notepad, you can do so. From the main screen, press your phone’s menu button, then tap the “remove ads” button. BACKUP NOTES To backup a note, press the share button and email to yourself the note you want to backup. TYPICAL USES Write To do lists (Note: check-list support is now here for to do lists!), shopping lists, addresses, email, SMS, Twitter updates*, write lyrics, poems, or even a novel if you feel like it! The uses are limited only by your imagination. Follow @workpail on twitter ( http://twitter.com/workpail ) and facebook ( http://www.facebook.com/profile.php?id=100001471431772 ) to receive updates about InkPad Note pad. Known issues: some users have experienced problems when using Swype keyboard, please email me if you have problems. Atrix users with previously installed version of the note pad will have to change the font to "Android default font". *Assumes separate Twitter client is installed, Twitter cannot post note pad content longer than 140 characters.
release_text: - PIN code lock (premium feature) - Many performance and reliability and UI improvements - Navigation drawer - Logout/login to accounts more easily - Change default font (can be changed back in settings) - New font option LAST RELEASE: - Fixed bugs in search feature - Added in-app purchase permission so users can OPTIONALLY upgrade to premium, if they want to (it doesn't happen automatically). - Performance improvements

description: I think "Clear for iPhone" is a cool App, so I make the koalcat's Clear for Android ^_^ I don't want this app to be a copycat, so it will be not exactly the same as "Clear for iPhone". Koalcat's Clear is a simple to-do app that can let your mind to focus on your tasks with a simple-to-use and attractive interface. Tips: If you can not get pro version after pay for it, you can reinstall it to fix this bug and you should backup first. How to use: 1.move right to complete ***move right far to set reminder*** 2.move left to delete 3.pull down to create 4.pinch to switch 5.pull-to-expand to create 6.double-click to edit 7.click number to expand Now it supports more features: 1.add new to-do note with one line limit 2.move right to check the note. 3.move left to delete the note. 4.change the order of notes 5.support some gestures(v0.3) 6.support double-click edit feature(v0.4) 7.support backup and restore notes 8.support themes(v0.6) 9.support lists(v0.6) 10.widget Coming up soon: //1.sync with Google Tasks //2.notification And more... If you have any questions or feature suggestions, or would like to report a bug, please contact me immediately. E-mail Addr. koalcat@gmail.com For more information, plaese visit KoalCat's Blog. koalcat.sinaapp.com Special thanks: Maruthi Sheshuhnagh Vanerhost alexi Flo Rian Hein

description: XWidget is the Android version of the famous Free desktop customization platform "XWidget" for Windows. A very lightweight and highly customizable widget engine with powerful visual widget editor. [Feature] 1. Provides a new way to DIY widgets for Android. 2. Cross-platform widget: the widget you create on PC can run both on Windows and Android platform. More than 1000 widgets created for PC can be used on your Android device or Tablet! You can search on the official XWidget or on DeviantART. http://android.xwidget.com/ or http://deviantart.com/?order=5&q=xwidget XWidget for Android Beta only support: Image/Text/NumbImage/Rotator Controls, and DateTimeCore/WeatherCore/BatteryCore. We are developing more controls and cores. 3. All the widgets can be resized on Android 4.0+,otherwise you need custom launchers that support this function like ADW, Apex, GO Launcher, Nova etc. 4. Visualization widget designer for Windows PC: you can create your own widgets with XWidgetDesigner for Windows,and One-key to send the widget to your Android Device to preview or run. 5. Supports hotspots. 6. Runs on devices with old OS, Android 2.1+ 7. Few resources taken: running the widget only needs 6-12M RAM, not using the CPU in peacetime. 8. Very lightweight and Battery Friendly: Do not run any code or action after lock screen , has no effect to the lifetime of the battery. 9. Online widget gallery: One-touch to download and install widgets from online gallery. Large number of widgets in online gallery, updated daily. Long press to delete the widget. 10. Accuweather.com weather service for the weather widgets with up to 15 days forecast. 11. All the widgets use the original file extension ".xwp" of XWidget. NO EXTRA ".apk" files are installed in your phone. 12. Requires only a few Permissions : only needs to write in external storage and access network Permissions. 13. Totally FREE . Without any residual background services and processes: When closing the widget it will completely exit without any permanent backstage to slow down the system. [Available sizes] 1x1, 1x2, 1x4, 1x5, 2x1, 2x2, 2x4, 3x1, 3x2, 3x3, 3x4, 4x1, 4x2, 4x3, 4x4, 5x1, 5x2. [Permissions explained] write external storage - to save and load widgets. accsess network state - for weather data and download widget from gallery. device id and call information - Google's Admob need this permission,but you can disable all banners in widget list activity menu. NO PAYMENT IS REQUIRED! [Note] XWidget for Android Beta only support Image/Text/NumbImage/Rotator Controls, and DateTimeCore/WeatherCore/BatteryCore. We are developing to add more controls and cores. [Tutorials] How install widgets on Android phones: http://bbs.xwidget.com/viewtopic.php?f=18&t=3776 [Translator] Geman by Dagedee Hungarian by Szabó István If you can help to translate,please download this english language file: http://sdrv.ms/1eZcXmW [Special Thanks] Jimking,Slavoo,QianCang,Digigamer, [Note] Do not use any "Kill processes" or "Release memory" app to kill the XWidget's process , Doing this will cause the clock widgets stop update. Or You can add XWidget to the ignore list .
release_text: V1.09 Add: RoundLine/Circle/Line/Pie controls Fixed: Weather data is not the right bug Fixed: Menus display not right bug Fixed: Crash when select some of widgets Fixed: Memory leak problem Improve: Reduce the RAM usage

description: Yammer is the enterprise social network that helps you and your team collaborate openly and stay on top of it all. With Yammer, you can connect to the right people in your organization, share and search for information across teams and organize around projects and ideas so you do more. With Yammer for Android, work gets done anywhere. You can contribute and collaborate with your team, even on the go. - Collaborate openly with your team: share ideas, work together and iterate in real-time in Yammer groups, wherever you are. - Connect with everyone: don’t let the org chart get in the way. Yammer brings together people who share the same goals across the whole company or organization, so fluid collaboration just happens. - Stay connected: with Yammer for Android you're just a tap away from coworkers, information and conversations. - Share photos and videos: snap a pic or capture a video, then easily share it with coworkers, regardless for file size. - Get interactive notifications: get notified of important activity right when it happens – and take action right from the lock screen of your Android device. - Work across languages barriers: bring down language silos in your organization with 25-language support in Yammer for Android – including integrated, on–the–fly message translation.
release_text: QUICKER POSTING – Post Group posts or private messages from the same place, anywhere in the app PRETTIER LINKS – Links posted to Yammer from web now have a big beautiful image as a background EASIER SHARING – Find Share under the More menu, which allows you to easily share content within Yammer SMARTER NOTIFICATIONS – Push notifications on your phone go away if you read their messages elsewhere! ANDROID WEAR – Get notifications/messages & send replies with your voice, right from your smartwatch!

description: 'Click to Symbols' app allows fastly inserting lots of different special chars to your messages everywhere. Just open the app and select a symbol - it will be automatically copied to the clipboard. App can be attached to the system bar or to the search key. Simeji is also supported. Less clicks, more convenient! P.S.: there's also a huge char tables, you can enable it in the settings. Some chars in these tables aren't supported by all Android phones. Some custom ROMs, such as MIUI, can display its. P.P.S.: if you have anything to say - please leave a comment, I'll be pleased! :)
release_text: Some bugs were fixed. Some symbols were rearranged.

description: 100 Balls+ is simple but addicting app. Test your reaction in single tap game with realistic physics engine. Tap on screen to open the pot. Your purpose is to fill moving cups with falling balls. Filled cups will return balls to the pot. Empty cups will be unhooked from the moving chain. The game ends when all balls or cups are lost. Each level speeds up the cups. On higher levels cups will change color. Colored cups produces higher value colored balls. The longer you remain in the game, the more points you receive.
release_text: Update v0.7: - Added different size and speed for cups and balls on every difficulty level - Added advanced level where you can set up your preferred game mode

description: Select one of your SMS conversations or one of your MMS attachments and send it via email. There is free trial version which you can download and use for one day. Please use the trial version first to make sure that the app works on your phone without any problems. use this simple application to backup your text threads, save your MMS attachments or forward your SMS and MMS to any email address, fast and effectively. It can also be used to upload your text SMS messages to Evernote, Dropbox and other services. Also, you can upload your multi-media messages (MMS) to facebook , picasa , twiter and so on. release_text: fixed issue with SMS threads and contacts with two or more numbers

description: The relaxing ambiance of a crackling fire on your Android device. Choose three different audio tracks, Classical music, Holiday music or just the crackle of the fire. Regular wood burning fire too passe? We've also got a trippy multi-colored fire if you're feeling adventurous. It doesn't stop there, there is also a silent film, 8-bit and a 'painted' fireplace. Why? ..Why not? And to top it off we've included 5 deleted scenes. (Hey, filming a stationary fireplace with a stationary camera is tough, you don't always get it right the first time) The Android Fireplace Experience. The best thing to ever happen to your Android device, absolutely, without doubt. EVER. IMPORTANT USE NOTES: -Please don't imitate any potentially dangerous behavior you should see in these videos, it's there for entertainment purposes and was done in a controlled supervised setting. -We also advise against eating lead paint chips, deep frying food while naked or reading too much Russian classical literature in one sitting while in a darkened room, wearing black and thinking sad thoughts.

Many users gave this app a low rate because not all calculators are enabled in this free version. I can understand but that's unfair to us. Anyway, in the new 2.0 release, instead of prevent you from using some more advanced calculators, we will allow you to use them by showing a full screen ads. If you don't like to see any ads, you can always upgrade to the full version which has no ads, but at least now you can use all the calculators.
release_text: v2.1 support android lollipop, added 2014 tax data v2.0 in this free version, we allow the usage of all 20 financial calculators by showing ads to support our development effort. redesigned new interface that looks great on android 4.0 and above. fixed many bugs, update the tax to use 2013 data v1.1 remove background, updated tax bracket using 2010 data

description: Zombie Bird Hunter How long can you survive the Zombie Infection? Zombies Birds are coming, Now the zombie virus infected the birds, which attacking the world. World is in caution, Now you are the Zombie Bird Hunter to save the world.You are a lone survivor in a world gone infected. Kill as many zombie birds as you can before your time is up! and Help the doctor to develop the anti virus to save the world, else world will be a graveyard. but be in caution... They are everywhere... Don’t be hesitating. Take up your weapons and shoot these devil birds courageously... Zombie bird hunter is an action game with wide variety of guns and missions. description: Tablet version Features available only in Zoner Mobile Security: * Ads detection * Backup & Restore - SMS and Call logs (NOT Android 4.4 Kitkat and newer) Other features: * Theft Protection (find and control your missing device) * Installed app protection * On-access and on-demand scan * Phone filtering (block calls and messages) * Parental lock for calls * Permission viewer * Task Manager * Automatic and manual database updates * Home screen widget * Secure messages Zoner Mobile Security is a modern security and anti-virus solution for your device. It provides protection against viruses, dialers, trojans, worms, spyware, adware and other malware as well as phone call and message protection. You can test the antivirus using applications containing the EICAR test file, like Zoner AntiVirus Test. Ads detection provides you with notifications about installed apps that include ads. Backup SMS and Call logs and move them between your devices. Theft Protection enables you to remotely control and locate your device via SMS messages. If you have lost it somewhere you can get a location or sound an alarm for people to notice it. If it has been stolen you will be notified when SIM is changed. App protection checks all newly installed applications for malware. You can scan any old installed applications from the menu. On-access protection scans any downloaded files and optionally the whole SD Card when plugged in. Phone filtering provides blocking of unwanted SMS/MMS and also protects you from malicious apps that call paid numbers. As a bonus it provides a parental lock for outgoing calls. Secure messages are encrypted messages that you can send via SMS, email, facebook, twitter, etc. Zoner AntiVirus uses strong encryption to send selected messages in unreadable form. The recipient can read those messages only when he has the right key (password). Languages: العربية, Česky, 中文, Deutsch, English, Español, Français, Bahasa Indonesia, Italiano, 日本語, 한국어, Magyar, Polski, Português (Brasilia), Pусский, Română (by Cristian Drossu), Slovensky, Tiếng Việt (by Tran Thanh Binh), Türkçe (by Saner Apaydın), Yкраї́нська

Tomaten, Zwiebeln, Käse, ein wenig Basilikum, ein paar Tropfen Olivenöl und ab in den Ofen - „Pizza, Pizza!" heißt es kurz darauf. Gelingt es Ihnen, Ihrer Kundschaft ganz schnell die Wunschpizza zu backen? Zufriedene Gäste garantieren Erfolg - andernfalls verlieren Sie auch all Ihre Stammkunden an die Konkurrenz und der Traum von der eigenen Pizzeria ist schnell ausgeträumt. „Pizza, Pizza!“ ist ein spannendes 3-Gewinnt-Spiel mit Management-Elementen. Je pfiffiger und schneller Sie arbeiten, desto gehobener können Sie das Ambiente Ihres „Restaurante“ ausstatten. Backen Sie sich durch viele spannende Level und machen Sie Ihre Pizzeria zum beliebtesten Haus am Platz! Das ist die deutsche Version von Pizza, Pizza! Tomatoes, onions, cheese, a little basil, a few drops of olive oil and into the oven - "Pizza, Pizza" states shortly thereafter. If you succeed quickly to bake your clientele the desire Pizza? Satisfied guests guarantee success - otherwise, you lose all your regular customers to the competition and the dream of their own pizzeria has faded quickly. "Pizza, Pizza" is an exciting match-3 game with management elements. The smarter and faster you work, the more sophisticated you can equip the ambience of your "restaurant". Bake your way through many exciting levels and make your pizza the most popular house on the square! This is the German version of Pizza, Pizza!

Gründe, in diesem spannenden Match 3 Game, unter dem Schutz der Götter eine stolze, römische Stadt! Ein Streit zwischen den Göttern Jupiter, Juno, Neptun und dem Kriegsgott Mars findet im Abschluss einer Wette ein eher vorläufiges Ende. Der Mittelpunkt dieser Wette bist ... Du! Wie die Wette ausgehen wird? Das liegt in Deinen Händen! Nutze all Deine 3-Gewinnt-Fähigkeiten und erprobe Dich als Erbauer einer prunkvollen Stadt. Spiele Dich durch viele Level, in denen Du vielleicht sogar den Schutz der Götter genießen wirst. Senke die Kosten der Bauwerke indem Du die zahlreichen Bonusspiele gewinnst. Trophäen geben Dir einen Überblick über bereits erreichte Ziele. Sammle Rohstoffe und erschaffe sowohl die Grundlagen einer Wirtschaft sowie monumentale Bauwerke und lass eine herrliche Stadt entstehen! Bist Du bereit für diese große Herausforderung? Feature List: - Spannendes Match 3 Game - Bonusraketen, die es richtig krachen lassen - Errichtung monumentaler Gebäude - Göttersegen - Tolle Bonusspiele & Extras - Trophäenraum This is the German version! To get to the English version see here: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=de.dresden.magnussoft.talesofempireV2.eng Reasons, in this exciting Match 3 game, under the protection of the gods, a proud Roman city! A dispute between the gods Jupiter, Juno, Neptune, and the god of war Mars is in a bet, rather a temporary end. The center of this bet are ... You! As go the bet? This is in your hands! Use all your match-3 skills and prove what you as a builder of a magnificent city. Games you through many levels in which you will perhaps enjoy the protection of the gods. Lower the costs of construction by winning the numerous bonus games. Trophies give you an overview of already achieved goals. Collect resources and create both the fundamentals of an economy as well as monumental buildings and let a beautiful city arise! Are you ready for this challenge? Feature List: - Exciting Match 3 Game - Bonus missiles, which can rip it right - Building of monumental buildings - Gods blessing - Great Bonus Games & Extras - Trophy room This is the German version! To get to the English version see here: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=de.dresden.magnussoft.talesofempireV2.eng

description: Poker Star Odds Calculator is a Texas Hold'em, Odds Calculator / Hand Evaluator for Texas Hold'em to calculate Poker odds. Outs will be calculated for Flushdraws, Gutshots and Pairs after Flop and Turn. The Win, Draw and Loss % Values will be calculated by a Monte Carlo Simulation (Approximation) from HeadsUp to 10 players, depending on the number of "unknowns" and the current accuracy Settings, after pressing the Simulate Button. Additional is calulated, how many Hands are stronger as your Hand, in the current Situation (HandStrength HS), directly after Card selection. Use Poker Star Odds Calculator e.g. in Heads Up (2P) like: If (Win + Draw) > 95 then Reraise else If (Win + Draw) > 56 then Raise else If (Win + Draw) > 50 then Call else Fold For x Players use eg for Call: If (Win + Draw) > (100 div PlayerCount) then Call (100 div PlayerCount) = 100 div 2 Players = 50% 100 div 3 Players = 33% 100 div 4 Players = 25% 100 div 5 Players = 20% 100 div 6 Players = 16.66% 100 div 7 Players = 14,29% 100 div 8 Players = 12,50% 100 div 9 Players = 11.11% 100 div 10 Players = 10% -> E.g. For 6 Players: Call if (Win + Draw) > 16.66% Features: * Calculates odds for Texas Hold'em Poker * Ad free * Real time approximate odds are displayed while calculating more precise odds * A Monte Carlo simulation(approximation) will be ran to calculate the odds * Odds/outs can be calculated for 2 - 10 players * Discard up to 5 cards(exposed cards) Show the world how good you are at Texas Hold'em Poker. Choose the winning hand in a given random Poker hand situation. You will see a random hand with 2-10 players and a random hand state (flop / turn). 1) Unique game for Texas Holdem Poker gamers! 2) Shows you the Odds If you have any questions, please Email me. Poker odds calculator: choose players' hole cards and optionally some of the board cards and get winning probability and equity for each player. Currently supports Texas Holdem only.

FahrInfo Dresden is a mobile timetable information service for the public regional transport in the transport consortium of Oberelbe abbreviated VVO. No matter if by bus, tram, suburban train (S-Bahn) or regional train: FahrInfo finds the best connection for you from point A to point B and takes you, thanks to Google Maps integration, from door to door! Contents: - information on connecting service - display of departures - public transport network maps - displaying stations nearby - information on current and upcoming disturbances and changes in service Necessary authorization: - Your location: Hence FahrInfo can identify your current location, navigate you from A to B and find stations nearby. - Your personal information: FahrInfo can navigate you directly from or to the address of your phone contacts. This contact data is of course highly confidential and will maintain only on your smartphone. - Storage: FahrInfo saves among others network transport maps and graphical elements on your smartphone. At the first start of the app these will be downloaded once.

description: ClipNote is now free and replaces all other free versions of ClipNote. ClipNote automatically saves anything that is copied into the Android clipboard and provides fast access to previous clipboard entries to re-copy them to the clipboard. It also is a full note-taking application and allows to manage clips and notes through a simple and unobtrusive user interface. ClipNote uses a background process to capture any change to the system clipboard. This background process only uses very few resources and almost no battery power. But if it is desired it can be switched off in the app settings (from the menu). If it is disabled the symbol in the notification bar won't be shown. A description of the features and usage can be found on our website or in the app by invoking "Info" from the menu and then pressing the "Help" button.
release_text: Version 1.7.1: File backup and restore of the ClipNote database

description: * NEW * __________________________________________________________________ New in ver 2.0 (05-20-2014): - Setup-Panel via 3-Stroke Button in upper left corner - New File-Open Panel - too big characters in speed-read bar fixed! - gap between characters in speed read bar fixed! -EPUB-file support (open ebook files via FileOpen Button) install Pdf2Txt engine 2.0 for that! -HTML to TXT (share via browser menu) install Pdf2Txt for that! -Split large texts to pages -WPM in steps of 50th -PDF-file support (You have to download FREE UNLIMITED 'Pdf2Txt-engine' from Play Store) -TXT-File support New functions for EPUB-, PDF- and TXT-file support: -Open button (PDF- or TXT-file) -Save to TXT-file button -Toggle button (PDF-view or HTML-view/TXT-view) New actions on PDF-view: -Swipe Up for 'next page in document' -Swipe DOWN for 'previous page in document' -Double Tap for zoom in/out (single step) Known issues: (generell) - after install Floating Speed Read - please wait some seconds with first start, because of android OS needs som time to build dalvik vm parts of app (Pdf2Txt) -multi column PDFs are now properly supported -PDF documents with much pictures are slowly processed after open file -very large PDF documents are slowly processed after open file (epub ebooks) in some 'dirty' compiled epub files Table Of Contents can't be properly eytracted Note: In most cases PDFs, scanned from documents, have mo extractable text inside! The free 'Pdf2Txt-engine' is unlimited for 'Floating Speed Read' users! __________________________________________________________________ Floating Speed Read is a fast reading tool, inspired by Spritz! It's read bar can float over any app and brings real multitasking to speed read. You can use 'share' any text out of any app, that can use android's 'share content', to take over text into 'Speed Read'. A second option to take over text is, to copy text to android's clipboard and paste it it into Speed Read's textbox. While speed reading, you have to focus to the colored character! May be, you need some training for faster reading! Use a slider,to control reading speed for your personal needs! in steps of 50th From 100 words/minute (beginner) To 1000 words/minute (genius)
release_text: New in ver 2.0 (05-20-2014) -Setup-Panel via 3-Strokes Button in upper left Corner -New File-Open-Panel -too big characters in speed read bar -> fixed! -gap between characters in speed read bar -> fixed! -EPUB file support (open epub ebooks via File Open Button) install Pdf2Txt engine 2.0 for that! -HTML to TXT (share via browser menu) install Pdf2Txt! -Split large Texts to pages -WPM in steps of 50s -Stability improved

description: Falk Maps bietet als verlässlicher Begleiter für Autofahrer, Fußgänger und Fahrradfahrer funktionale Online-Karten mit Routenplanung sowie mehrere Millionen touristische Sonderziele wie Restaurants, Hotels, Shopping, Sehenswürdigkeiten und vieles mehr. Features: Karten - Online-Karten für jeden Anlass (Straßenkarte, OpenStreetMap, Radfahrerkarte, Geländekarte, öffentliche Verkehrsmittelkarte, etc.) - Weltweite Luft-/Satellitenbilder - Wetterkarte - Fotokarte mit Sehenswürdigkeiten Routen - Routenplanung mit Drag´n Drop-Funktionalität - Echtzeit-Verkehrsinformationen - Karte folgt im „Follow-Modus“ dem aktuellen Standort - Routenoptionen: Auto-, Fahrrad- oder Fußgängerroute, Autobahnen vermeiden, Mautstraßen vermeiden POIs - Über 5 Millionen Points of Interest aus den Kategorien Essen & Trinken, Ausgehen & Kultur, Sehenswertes, Hotels, Shopping, Freizeit & Sport und Auto & Verkehr - Kategorienauswahl und Freitextsuche - POIs können direkt angerufen und geteilt werden (z.B. per Twitter) Bitte beachten: - Während der Nutzung von Falk Maps ist eine Internetverbindung erforderlich (die App enthält keine Offline-Karten und belegt somit kaum Gerätespeicherplatz. Nur die tatsächlich erforderlichen Kartenkacheln werden geladen). Bitte achten Sie auf Ihr Datenvolumen, wenn Sie keine Internet-Flatrate nutzen oder sich im Ausland befinden. - Falk Maps bietet keine Turn-by-turn-Navigation. Wir wünschen Ihnen viel Freude mit Falk Maps! Lob? Kritik? Verbesserungsvorschläge? Schreiben Sie uns bitte eine E-Mail an hilfe@falk.de mit dem Betreff "Falk Maps Android" und Angabe Ihres Gerätes + Android-Version. Wir antworten gerne und kümmern uns um Ihr Anliegen. Da Falk Maps webbasiert ist, kann der Start der App je nach Internetverbindung ein paar Sekunden dauern. Sie können Falk Maps auch direkt im mobilen Browser aufrufen: m.falk.de Das Internetportal zur App: www.falk.de Falk Maps as a reliable companion for motorists, pedestrians and bicyclists provides functional online maps with route planning as well as several million tourist POIs such as restaurants, hotels, shopping, attractions and more. Features: Maps - Online cards for every occasion (road map, OpenStreetMap, cyclists map, terrain map, public transportation card, etc.) - Worldwide Luft-/Satellitenbilder - Weather map - Photo Map Local Attractions Routes - Route planning with Drag'n Drop functionality - Real-time traffic information - Map follows in "Follow mode" the current location Avoid car, bike or pedestrian route, highways, avoid toll roads: Route Options - POIs - Over 5 million points of interest from the categories Eating & Drinking, Nightlife & Culture, Attractions, Hotels, Shopping, Recreation & Sports and Cars & Transportation - Category selection and free text search - POIs can be directly called and shared (eg via Twitter) Please note: - While the use of Falk Maps an Internet connection is required (the app does not include offline maps and thus has little device memory space only the actually required map tiles are loaded.). Please ensure that your data if you do not use Internet-Flatrate or are abroad. - Falk Maps does not provide turn-by-turn navigation. We wish you much joy with Falk Maps! Praise? Criticism? Improvement? Please write us an e-mail to hilfe@falk.de with the subject "Falk Maps Android" and stating your device + Android version. We are happy to respond and take care of your concerns. As Falk Maps is web based, the launch of the app may take a few seconds depending on your internet connection. You can call Falk Maps directly in the mobile browser: m.falk.de The Internet portal to the app: www.falk.de

Flohmarkt Fans aufgepasst. Die Android App von Flohmarkt-Termine.NET gibt es gratis! Was kann die Trödelmarkt App? - Flohmärkte in Deiner Umgebung finden - Überdachte Trödelmärkte bei "Schietwetter" aufspüren! - Flohmarkt Umkreis Suche - Trödelmärkte in einer bestimmten Stadt finden - Route berechnen - Termine im Kalender speichern - Veranstalter für Standanfragen kontaktieren!!! und natürlich viele Informationen rund um die einzelnen Veranstaltungen, teilweise auch mit schönen Bildern von vergangenen Flohmärkten. WICHTIG: Bitte bedenkt das die Webseite: flohmarkt-termine.net kostenlos ist, genauso wie diese App. Daher kann es passieren das Termine nicht aktuell sind oder kurzfristig geändert wurden. Bitte vergewissert Euch immer beim Veranstalter ob der Flohmarkt auch stattfindet! So erspart Ihr Euch unnötige Fahrten und Frust! Viel Spaß mit der kostenlosen Flohmarkt App!!! P.S.: Sollte ein Flohmarkt in Eurer Region fehlen, sprecht euren regionalen Veranstalter an! Eintragen der Termine ist für Veranstalter kostenlos! Berechtigungen der App und warum wir diese verwenden: 1. Speicher: Inhalt des USB-Speichers ändern/löschen Diese Berechtigung benötigen wir für die Verwendung von Google Maps Karten. 2. Ihr Standort: Genauer Standort (GPS) Der Standort wird benötigt um euch die Flohmärkte in eurer Umgebung anzeigen zu können. 3. Netzwerkkommunikation: Vollständiger Internetzugriff und Netzwerkstatus anzeigen Wird benötigt, da die Flohmarktdaten aus dem Internet nachgeladen werden. 4. Ihre Konten: Google-Servicekonfiguration lesen Diese Berechtigung ermöglicht der App, Konfigurationsdaten für die Kartendarstellung von Google Maps zu lesen. 4. Entwicklungstools: Zugriff auf geschützten Speicher testen Diese Berechtigung benötigen wir für die Verwendung von Google Maps Karten. Flea market fans watch. The Android app from flea market Termine.NET there are free! What can the flea market app? - Find flea markets in your area - Covered at flea markets "Schietwetter" track! - Flea Market Show - Find flea markets in a particular city Get directions - - Save appointments in the calendar - Organizer for stand inquiries contact! and of course lots of information about the various events, some with beautiful images of past flea markets. IMPORTANT: Please keep in mind that the website: flea market-termine.net is free, just like this app. Therefore, it can happen that dates are not current or changed at short notice. Please made sure you always the organizer if the flea market also takes place! So you will save you unnecessary trips and frustration! Have fun with the free flea market app! PS: If a flea market in your region missing, talk to your regional organizer! Enter the dates is free for organizers! Permissions the app and why we use it: 1 Modify / delete the content of the USB memory: memory This permission, we need to use Google Maps. 2 Your location: Exact location (GPS) The site is required in order to show you the flea markets in your environment. 3 Network communication: View Full Internet access and network status If needed, since the flea market data is loaded from the internet. 4 Your accounts: read Google service configuration This permission allows the app to read configuration data for the map display Google Maps. 4 Development Tools: test access to protected memory This permission, we need to use Google Maps.

The soundboard is ~9*12. Thanks to all people who do tutorials about all kinds of music applications so this little "dubstep maker" could emerge.

THIS APP DOES NOT PLAY AUDIO ITSELF. TRY MY OTHER STANDALONE APPS. Bugged of interrupting your flow of playing Maschine when selcting another scene? Here's the solution. The Maschine Scene Selector allows you to switch through your scenes by pushing the buttons on your smartphone. Why? I found it very annoying to press "scene" every time i wanted to change the scene on Native Instruments Maschine, because it interrupted my live playing. So I did a solution for it. How do i connect? You find a step-by-step instruction here: http://bandevents.de/connect.html A general understanding of scenes you get in the original Maschine manual from Native Instruments, in their documentation everything is described very good. WORKS FOR BOTH MK1 // MK2. Sorry for the ads but I am a student (...) I tried it to place there, where it disturbs no one.

Mit Deiner HyperCheck App kannst Du Dein ADHS-Tagebuch führen und Auswertungen bekommen. Deine HyperCheck App hilft Dir, Deine ADHS besser zu verstehen und Deine Therapie in ihrer Wirkung zu betrachten. Die HyperCheck App informiert im Rahmen des HyperCheck Patientenserviceprogramms Deinen Arzt darüber, wie es Dir geht. So ist Dein Arzt aktuell informiert und kann schnell entscheiden, ob Du eine Veränderung deiner Therapie benötigst. Was Deine HyperCheck App Dir bietet HyperCheck Me Du kannst einfach und intuitiv Dein ADHS-Tagebuch führen Trage Dein Befinden in HyperCheck Me ein – mit freiem Text und mit coolen Buttons. Jederzeit kannst Du in dein Tagebuch schauen und nachsehen, wie es Dir ergangen ist. My Level Charts Coole Diagramme zeigen Dir die Auswertung Schau Dir in My Level Charts die Auswertungen an und sieh, welche Lebenssituationen Dir Probleme machen – und wann Du Probleme mit Deiner ADHS hattest: Letzte Woche? Letzten Monat? Letzten Sommer? My HyperCheck senden Was Dein Arzt wann von Dir erfährt, legst Du selbst fest Sende Deinem Arzt die Informationen zu Deinem Befinden zu. Online kann Dein Arzt im HyperCheck Arztportal auf die Informationen aus Deinem HyperCheck Me zugreifen und sehen: z. B. Wie es Dir gerade geht, wie es Dir letzte Woche vormittags im Unterricht gegangen ist, wie es Dir seit einer Umstellung der Therapie gegangen ist. My HyperDoc Du kannst Deine HyperCheck App personalisieren Du kannst die Kontaktdaten Deines Arztes verwalten und Deinen Arzt aus Deiner HyperCheck App heraus direkt erreichen. My Place Du verwaltest Deine Erinnerungen und Termine Du kannst Deine Termine anlegen und die Erinnerungsfrequenzen festlegen. Du wirst erinnert an Eintragungen in My HyperCheck, an Nachbestellungen und mehr. FAQ Wissen über ADHS für Dich (und für Deine Eltern) Das Wissensportal zu ADHS bietet Dir FAQs und weitere Infos, dazu nützliche Links für ADHS-Betroffene. Hast Du Fragen oder Vorschläge? Nimm mit uns Kontakt auf. Wir freuen uns von Dir zu hören. Und wir freuen uns auf eine 5-Sterne Bewertung! Website www.HyperCheck.me Mail info@HyperCheck.me With your Hyper Check App you can lead your diary and get ADHD evaluations. Your Hyper Check App helps you to better understand your ADHD and look at your treatment in their effect. The Hyper Check App informed within the Hyper Check patient service program your doctor about how you are. So your doctor is informed and can quickly decide whether you need a change in your therapy. What your Hyper Check App offers you Hyper Check Me You can easily and intuitively perform your ADHD diary Carrying your being a Hyper Check Me - with free text and cool buttons. At any time you can look in your journal and see what happened to you. My Level Charts Cool charts show you the evaluation Look at My Level Charts evaluations and see what life make you problems - and when you had problems with your ADHD: Last week? Last month? Last summer? My Hyper send check What your doctor when experiencing of yourself, you put yourself firmly Send your doctor's information to your being too. Online can access your doctor in Hyper Check Doctor portal on the information from your Hyper Check Me and see, for example, how are you just as the morning went out last week in the classroom, as it went out for a change of therapy. My HyperDoc You can personalize your Hyper Check App You can manage the contact details of your doctor and reach your doctor in your Hyper Check app directly. My Place You are managing your reminders and appointments You can create your appointments and set the memory frequencies. You will be reminded of entries in My Hyper check on re-orders, and more. FAQ knowledge about ADHD for you (and for your parents) The knowledge portal for ADHD provides you with more information and FAQs, plus useful links for ADHD sufferers. Do you have any questions or suggestions? Take up contact with us. We look forward to hearing from you. And we look forward to a 5-star review! Website www.HyperCheck.me Mail info@HyperCheck.me

Now with even more levels! "Neon Zone is a charming little title that evokes the style of something like Osmos, and the ingenious fun of – dare I say it? – Portal" – Bits n Bytes Gaming "The task is trying to pen up this review without glancing over at the game again for fear of not being able to tear our eyes away for another hour or so." – The Indie Game Magazine "It's a really interesting take on the physics-based puzzle games, and with the unique take on level music and its simple-yet-tough-to-master gameplay, it's definitely worth your time" – Pocket Full Of Apps Neon Zone is a physics-based brain teaser in which walls become floors as you turn your phone. The objective is simple: Slide the block to absorb all energy spheres in order to advance to the next level. Move the block by rotating the phone and tap to jump to the floors above while you avoid falling off the level. Key features: - Pick up and play - Physics-based puzzles - Extra rewards for replay value Keywords: gravity, minimalistic, light, jump, art, cube, square, block, zen, platform *** If you have any problems with this game, please send us an email. Rating down only decreases likelihood of updates, and we still cannot fix the problem if you don't contact us. Thanks :) ***
release_text: This update should fix the game for newer decvices. Write us an email if you have problems.

description: The amazing Rocket Copter man is out of control in his colorful flight suits! Can you control him or will you crash? 1) Tap on your device to fly and change direction of the helicopter propeller. 2) Avoid the bombs to level up and earn achievements or they will smash your head and you will crash... 3) and most importantly... beat your friends high score and earn medals. Have a blast!
release_text: - Tweaked gameplay, Rocket Copter man is not as crazy and suicidal as he used to be

description: Who and what is Kotori? Kotori is Japanese for "little bird". Kotori is a creature living on your wallpaper; also when your phone is sleeping. Kotori will sleep, eat, talk, and age -- it is your job to keep Kotori well-fed and healthy. The scenery itself will also change depending on the time of the day. Kotori will also help you; Kotori will let you know if you have a new text message, email, missed call or notice if your device is low on battery and much more. All artwork is authentically hand-drawn on paper with the use of a graphite pencil! If you love Tamagotchi, the idea behind caring for a virtual pet, you'll love Kotori! Kotori is a dynamic experience with an emphasis on depth and charm. Feature overview: - Notify you on email, text messages, missed calls and others things - React to different events on your phone; ie. music playback, battery and more - Age like a creature (also when your phone is in deep-sleep) - Sleep when needed; approx. every 8 hours (varies) - Need food; you need to feed Kotori with icons (it's easier to give food when Kotori is flying... the mood indicates food need) You can also use the "feeding" widget - Die if you ignore feeding - Need a bath regularly - Poo; you need to clean it up - Talk to you - Gain strength when flying (tap the clouds) - Gain extra strength when your phone is charging - Better strength; fly higher - Get a house at 4 days of age (construction begins earlier; after 1 complete day) - Further upgrades to house as Kotori ages - Dynamic world; rain, sun/moon day/night according to real world time - Blossoming flowers; dynamically growing flowers that will evolve, age and eventually die. Rain results in faster growth. Spawn is random, so look out for shoots ;) - An owl will appear sometimes; giving out various tips - Various dynamic holiday events; such as easter and christmas - Replicate the original Tamagotchi-style More features are still being added! Have an idea? Request it by sending an email! mini game tamagotchi kotori little bird pet pets live wallpaper animal virtual simulation life
release_text: *Added option to disable visits by the owl. If enough want IMAP support it will be enabled! Requires internet access permissions.

description: Space Invasion is a cool new game, inspired by the old Space Invaders. Retro graphics improved and brought up-to-date with whole new effects and sounds, breathe new life into the classic game, turning it into a fun, fast-paced game for all ages, more entertaining than ever. Shoot the enemies, before they land and take over the world as we know it :) The fun exceeds the price by far. Have fun! Controls: Tilt your device from side to side to control your spaceship. Tap anywhere on the screen to fire a missile towards the enemies. Hold your finger on the screen to fire continuously. Credits: Sprites by: GooperBlooper22 from deviantart.
release_text: -Version 6 Visual improvements. Easier gameplay. Small bugfixes. -Version 5 Added pause menu. Added 60% chance of power-up instead of points when shooting the ufo. Updated ad-plugin. Improved performance. Reduced enemies projectile speed. Reduced enemy speed on level-change.

description: Del og hjælp med at finde efterlyste hunde i hele landet. Hurtig og nemt. Hjælp hinanden ved at dele og kommentere direkte fra app'en. Er din hund forsvundet?! Opret en efterlysning, hurtig og nemt, og få hjælp til at efterlyse hunden med det samme. Hvor og når som helst! Del din efterlysning via de sociale medier og spred budskabet i hele landet rundt på få minutter. Hundeejer / Efterlyser: - Opret en efterlysning hurtig og nemt - vælg et billede af din hund og opret. - Del din efterlysning med venner/familie via Facebook eller send et link direkte til en gruppe/side. - Få delt dit opsalg til 10.000+ hundeejere og hundeinteresserede Hjælpere: - Modtag automatisk push-meddelelse når der kommer nye hundeefterlysninger. - Del og hjælp via Facebook. - Følg på de forskellige efterlysningssager og modtag en push-meddelelse når en efterlysning er meldt afsluttet. Fundet en herreløs hund? - Opret en fremlysning hurtig og nemt - vælg billede hunden og opret - Følg fremlysninger - Del og hjælp med at finde frem til hundeejer Hunde Efterlysning: Udviklet af Vi ELSKER Hunde / www.vielskerhunde.dk Share and help in finding missing dogs in the country. Quick and easy. Help each other by sharing and commenting directly from the app. Is your dog disappeared?! Create an APB, quick and easy, and help you advertise for the dog immediately. Where and anytime! Share your inquiry via social media and spread the word across the country around in minutes. Dog owner / After the Lights: - Create a wanted quick and easy - choose a picture of your dog and create. - Share your luggage with friends / family via Facebook or send a link directly to a group / page. - Get shared your upsell to 10,000 + dog owners and dog interested Helpers: - Automatically receive push notification when new dogs inquiries. - Share and via Facebook. - Follow the different inquiry cases and receive a push notification when a warrant is for finalization. Found a stray dog? - Create an advertisement quick and easy - select picture dog and create - Follow up information - Share and help identify the dog owner Dogs Wanted: Developed by We LOVE Dogs / www.vielskerhunde.dk

Dragon Run - Free Action Fantasy Running Game The new thrilling fantasy Dragon run game is here ! Enjoy the adventurous run through the mysterious jungle. A quick +1 is much appreciated..thanks You are the dragon,and you must survive the mysterious forest.The only way to survive in this jungle is to run,and run really fast.You must escape the jungle before its too late.Keep in mind that the best defence is a good offence. Controls: Attack - Swipe down Left - Swipe left Right - Swipe right

A simple tool for create pixel art and sprite art. Perfect to create small sprite for video game. Easy control, just open app and start drawing. Work even better for device with big screen and (or) stylus --Tool: ++pencil, move, fill bucket, eye dropper, Select ++Mirror, Eraser, Preview ++New, Save, Save As, Open, Undo, Redo, Palette Manager --Zoom and Moving around with ease --This app limit the image size to 512x512. This mean you CAN'T open or create file bigger than that ***PLEASE READ THIS BEFORE DO ANY SERIOUS WORK*** --Some very important feature is hidden in the interface ++New, Save, Save as, Open can be find at the menu ++Click on the in-use color panel (the biggest one) to open color picker dialog ++Long Click on the in-use color panel to open Palette Manager ++In Palette Manager click on a color panel to selected it, click again on the selected panel to get it color. --Most of the function should be self-explain but some may work different than what you expected ++Switch the Eraser on will make Pencil or Fill bucket paint TRANSPARENT color no matter what color is in-use ++When open a file please use a File Manager or File Explorer app instead of the built-in Gallery. It may give some incorrect thumbail of image which can make your life harder. ++Click on Menu\Info to check filename and filepath (if already saved) I did my best to bring to you this app but I myself can't make sure this app is bug free. So please If you encounter any big (or small) bug, drop a review or email me so I can fix it as soon as possible. Suggestion is welcome too.
release_text: Version 1.5.2: another Quick fix ( sorry for making too much update lately ) __Fix anti-aliasing problem for some more device Version 1.5.1: Quick fix __Fix the anti-aliasing rendering on some device __Add option to turn on/off Grid Version 1.5: __Select tool can help you: move, copy, flip, rotate, delete your sprite __Save, Save as, New, Open can find at the menu __Preview tool

description: Take a Christmas Fireplace for you and enjoy the holidays with this Christmas Fireplace Live Wallpaper! Settings includes: - No Ads inside! - Three themes: Classic Noel The Night Before Christmas Christmas Morning - You can add your name in the Letter to Santa. - You can add your photo. - Christmas Tree decorations. - Snowfall with snow type, amount of snow, size, speed. - Songs "Jingle Bells" and "We wish you a Merry Christmas" by Kevin MacLeod (incompetech.com). - Drawing-room with fireplace and candles - Many decorations - Customizable effects. description: Impressive vertical space shooter, HD Graphics and Music. "My dear servant, I, your Emperor, have strict orders for you. You must finish all opposition to my power, you must destroy all my enemies." Increase your rage against the rebel horde in a pure arcade/action space shooter. Classic space shooter with a modern touch , outstanding graphics and music. Play to gain experience, collect gold to obtain more power-ups and unleash an extreme firepower and defeat the bosses. Features: Nice graphics. Superb music and realistic sound effects. 10 levels. 12 in paid version 6 Different planets. 6 Deadly final bosses. 3 Difficulty Options Loads of differents enemies ships flying in strategic formations. Gather bonuses, lives and 9 weapons upgrades. Three modes of control: tilting, touching and Zeemote. Graphics quality adjustable to improve the performance in low-end smartphones. Works fullscreen on Android Tablets. All screens supported. APP2SD supported. Integration with ScoreLoop online leaderboards. This is an Android ONLY exclusive title, cool shooter game for the Android. Ad version, ten complete levels. The permission of "Read contact data" and "Personal information" and used by Scoreloop. The permission of "fine (GPS) location" are used to serve ads. The permission of "Bluetooth" is used by Zeemote to control joystick. A secure version without permissions for those who seek security in their applications exists. All My Enemies Secure Deals of the Day [gizmodo.com] "All My Enemies is beautifully designed and rendered. The game also moves at faster frame rate than your usual Android games. Is a pretty good Android game. It has enough of the stuff that you’ll look for in an action-adventure-space-shooter." -Arnold Zafra, Android Apps. "Fantastic space opera" "Number 21 in the list of the 46 best applications of the week." -Artem Russakovski, Android police. "The app show" video review: http://www.theappshow.com/android/?p=1414 "If you like shmups, check this one out." Android Rundown review: http://www.androidrundown.com/app-rundown/enemies-review/ "All My Enemies is a successful tribute to the arcade blasters of yesteryear, and is the ideal score attack game" http://www.knowyourmobile.com/mobile-games/gamereviews/androidgamereviews/820026/all_my_enemies_review.html

The challenging HD vertical shooter strikes back, with better graphics and much more action. Save yourself against the rage of the emperor and get your revenge done in a pure arcade/action space shooter. Play to gain experience, collect gold to obtain more power-ups and unleash an extreme firepower. Features: Awesome graphics. Superb music and realistic sound effects. 12 levels. 6 different planets. 6 deadly final bosses. Loads of differents enemies ships flying in strategic formations. Gather bonuses, lives and weapons upgrades. Works fullscreen on Android tablets. All screens supported. Graphics stored in SD. APP2SD supported. Online leaderboards. Ad version, ten complete levels. They are bugs! and are racing! Race with them in a super exciting championship, in a colorful world beautifully designed and rendered. 4 worlds full of fun, 12 circuits, 24 runs, 3 game modes, 6 bugs and 7 items and weapons. Demo version, ad supported by push notifications, the ads can be viewed at the user's convenience rather than while using an app. Features: Colorful graphics. Superb music and realistic sound effects. 12 circuits. Two modes of control: touching and Zeemote. Works fullscreen on Android Tablets. All screens supported. APP2SD supported. Ad version, buy the full version and get a new World with 3 extra circuits.

Trivia Quiz is a trivia game with 6 different categories: geography, history, music & literature, science, sports and entertainment. The more questions you answer correctly, the higher your score. Answer 5 questions correctly in the same category and get 10,000 bonus points. - How many frogs does the average Frenchmen eat a year? - How many ghosts visit Scrooge in A Christmas Carol? - Who sang the Bond theme song 'For Your Eyes Only'? - Which team won the UEFA Champions League in the season 2005–06? - Which planet has the most moons? Test your knowledge and have fun with this challenging multiple choice quiz!

Journey planner, live departures (bus, tube and train), tube status, maps and routes - London transport made easy! Easy to use with an intuitive layout and flow. ► Easy to use point to point journey planner ► Live departures for bus, tube and train. ► Intelligent location search (stations, points of interest, post-codes etc.) ► Interactive tube map / tube status and more... Journey planner: ► Use the simple "Get me to..." function ► Select journey end points by text search (station names, points of interest, post codes etc.), selecting markers/pins on the map, choose your current location or a favourite place. ► Plan ahead for arrive or depart time. ► Specify transport mode / mobility requirements. Extra features: ► View itineraries as a list or on the map. ► Seamless connection from journey plans to live departures boards ► View transport routes (list of stops or map) with journey/arrival times. ► Keep a record of journey plans for viewing off-line. ► Built-in, searchable, interactive, geographical Tube Map ► Tube status report (Now / weekend) ► Reminder alarms for selected itineraries (long press the itinerary to activate) ► Font size settings (select in preferences) ► Filters and sort options for departures boards Tip: before you start typing, the search dialog shows your top three 'My places'. Sort 'My places' using the grabbers on the right of the screen to get home, work, etc. in the top three. London journey planning, made easy. ► Powered by the Transport for London Journey Planner API ► Live London bus (TfL Countdown) and underground departures and status provided by Transport for London ► Scheduled departures provided by Traveline / TMU Limited ► Rail information contains data provided by Network Rail Infrastructure Limited under the following license: http://www.networkrail.co.uk/data-feeds/terms-and-conditions/ Please give feedback to support@tmuapps.eu

Power Switch is a tool for devices with cases - somewhat like the SmartCover, it will turn off the screen when you shut the case. If you have a device with poor battery life, Power Switch can save tons of juice by switching it off entirely after a given amount of time asleep. FEATURES: - Sleep seconds after shutting case - Automatic shutdown (root only) - Set up a schedule using Night Mode - Configure sensor sensitivity - Facedown to turn screen off - Uses almost no power in single sensor mode The app has gone through an extensive testing process at XDA Developers. Thanks to everyone who helped make it happen, you're the best. ADMIN PERMISSIONS are required to manipulate the screen state without root. Keywords: root, rooted, tool, system, power, save, power saver, screen off, no lock, automatic shutdown, quick shutdown.
release_text: 1.1.4 Added option to disable in landscape Fixed issue with switching Night mode Fixed many device specific bugs (Tab 7.7, 8.9, 10.1)

description: Feeling paranoid? Need absolute privacy and security? Private Place lets you communicate secretly over normal phone networks. The app works on a simple premise - you interact with private contacts through a secret environment that uses our well known telephony daemon to hide SMS, MMS and calls 100% of the time. Features: • Hides all communications with enabled contacts • Disguises itself as a fully working AOSP calculator • Secures, sweeps or blocks incoming calls • Never turns on the screen in reject mode • Selectively clears frequent and recent call lists • Backs up to Dropbox and Google Drive Tech stuff: • Encrypts all its data • Package name obfuscated as "security firewall" • Root telephony daemon from RCB ensures 100% up-time for total peace of mind • 64-bit compatibility This app requires root access. If you don't know what that is, check here: http://fahrbot.co.uk/root . We do not provide any further root/superuser support other than at this address. If the app "suddenly stops working" youve probably lost root access. YOU MUST FIX THIS YOURSELVES. Uninstall the app, reboot, install from Play, open, run startup wizard, restore your backup data. NEVER USE 3RD PARTY BACKUP APPS , only in app backup. You can now remove sensitive apps from your update history by opening the Play app, choosing "MY APPS" and then finding Private Place in the "ALL" tab. Click the little cross to remove PP from your history. Limited support is provided for multi-sim devices. If you are considering getting one, please contact us first for advice on your purchase. Permissions: ACCOUNTS - licensing, cloud backup, contacts DIRECTLY CALL/SEND SMS/MMS - this is a dialer so these are essential NETWORK - this app creates its own sockets to replace the telephony layer CONTACTS - app manages its internal contacts and Google contacts DRAW OVER - used for the incoming call pattern locker and add number overlay panel COARSE LOCATION - for ads ETC - all necessary for various functions, if you need clarification, please contact us.
release_text: • Fixes • Removed StartApp Flash the latest SuperSu beta through recovery and clean install app - uninstall, reboot, install from play, grant root, test using default "Everyone" list. Full change log and beta updates can be found at the G+ community: http://goo.gl/xz8p8B

description: Touch Blocker is a simple but useful app that makes holding and using your device easier. There are two basic functions - it can create dead zones where touches do not register and also filter the screen when reading in low light. For those who have kids, the first tool is indispensable. Both functions can be controlled via device shake, notification or widget. You can create your own custom zones or use predefined ones. This is a stable Beta release. You can follow its progress at the XDA thread here: http://goo.gl/Tilmj Please be sure to write with suggestions - we are looking forward to engaging the community and building a useful and nifty application that many will enjoy!

description: Simple and fast app to give you the information you want right away. ---Widgets--- See today’s moon phase and rise and set times right on your home screen. Three sizes of widgets to choose from 1x1, 2x2, and 4x1. Uses the style of moon you pick as well. ---Large Beautiful Images--- Images of the moon phases large enough for a tablet but scale down for smaller devices as well. ---Barely Uses the GPS--- When the GPS is used, it is turned off right after a location is found. Then it continues to use this "last known location" unless you request an updated one. This saves your battery and puts the control of the GPS in your hands. ---Three Styles to Choose From--- Pick the style of moon phase you like the best. There is a realistic view, a moon with a sharp transition, and a simple black and white style. ---List of Cities--- No need to share your location, pick a city from the list to see the results for that area. ---Works Without An Internet Connection--- No internet connection is needed for the app to work. The data is calculated locally to give you an accurate moon phase, moonrise and moonset time. ---Customize The Display--- Choose to see more or less details. Turn on or off the illuminated fraction and days until the next full moon. Pick your daylight savings time settings, either US, EU, off, or always on. ---Why This App?--- Knowing the phase of the moon and when it will rise and set in your area can be useful for many reasons, such as: - Hunting - Fishing - Photography - Camping - Walking - Avoiding werewolves - Or for anyone who has an interest in how the moon will look

Are you commuting on Adelaide public transport? Then TripMate Adelaide Lite is your ideal companion. NEW: Now with Real Time Departures TripMate Adelaide Lite is a powerful offline timetable app which provides fast timetable access for Adelaide Metro Buses, Trams & Trains. With TripMate in your pocket you have access to Adelaide's transit information anywhere and anytime. Unlike other transit applications you do not need network access to check your timetable information. This means you get results fast. TripMate makes your commute easy with a variety of benefits: * TripMate works anytime and anywhere. No data network connection required. * Immediately find the next departure for your Stop. By Route or by Stop name. * Scan Stop Code QR code stickers at stops (currently being rolled out across Adelaide) * Use predictive search from the action bar on the top of the app to quickly find your Route or Stop. * Demo feature: Favourite Routes & Stops (with nick names) for convenient access. * View next Departures. * View Trip details. * View the Stops for your Trip on the map. * All the timetable information is stored on your phone. * TripMate informs you when updated timetable information is available for download from the 'More' screen. Don't worry, TripMate has the tiniest timetable files among all other transit apps out there. This saves you both bandwidth and storage space on your device. Check your notifications bar to download the most up-to-date timetable available. * Note: all times displayed are local Adelaide times This free version is ad supported. For an ad-free version and additional functionality (Favourites, Nearby Search, etc) please check out our paid version. Get access to fast timetable information and download TripMate Adelaide Lite today! For any feedback or bugs please contact us on Twitter (@trip_mate), our website ( http://www.tripmate.info/contact ) or like us on Facebook ( http://facebook.com/tripmateapp ).

description: This is simple unofficial infrared remote control app for Vizio TV. It works with phones and tablets with built-in IR blaster (Galaxy S4 , S4 mini , Active , Zoom, S5, Note 3, Note 8.0, 10.1, Galaxy Tab (not all), some HTC and LG phones with >4.4.2). The purpose is not to replace the original remote. This app is handy in emergency situations (original remote is lost, empty batteries etc). Two remotes (push "Menu"): → Compact remote for smaller phones (S4mini etc) → Full remote for phones/tablets wit at least 5" screen. ★ Works with phones and tablets with built-in IR sender with Vizio TVs. ★ You must point your phone’s IR blaster directly at the TV. Usual working range is 1-3 (max ~5 meters). ★ NO additional hardware is needed ★ App does NOT have full screen ads, no push notification ads or any kind of similar annoying pop-up ads. Common reasons for issues: 1. Your phone or tablet does not have IR-blaster or you are not pointing it at your TV or you are out of range (max range 5 - 15 tf). 2. With some phones in power saving mode or with almost empty battery the IR blaster might not work or range is 3-5 ft. 3. Your Vizio TV model does not have IR receiver or it is paired with Bluetooth (only) remote. This app is not affiliated with or endorsed by any other developers or companies.

description: TO USE THIS APPLICATION YOU'LL NEED ORIGINAL HEROES 3/WoG GAME FILES, THEY ARE NOT PROVIDED, IT'S RECOMMENDED THAT YOU PURCHASE IT FROM GOG.com VCMI Wiki: http://wiki.vcmi.eu/index.php?title=Main_Page Report bugs not specific to Android port here: http://bugs.vcmi.eu/ Help VCMI grow here: http://forum.vcmi.eu/viewtopic.php?t=844 ======================= VCMI is an open source engine which purpose is to rewrite entire Heroes of Might and Magic 3 (optionally with WoG) from scratch, giving it new and extended possibilities. It requires original game files to run, see http://vcmi.xyz.is/installation.html for more information on how to install it. VCMI is still in development so is this port. Expect crashes (on a bright side it seems to run a lot better than the old port from 2 years ago). Since this port is in no way related with vcmi.eu please don't spam their forums with bug reports. Instead, contact me by mail.

Sunrise and sunset based on the actual GPS location! SMS alert on mailbox! Real moon phase! Christmas lights on tree and on house! Turn on and turn off the light with a double tap! Customizations: Show/hide objects Show/Hide snow Manually set the moon phase Setting the type of flashing lights on tree and on house Setting the color of the Christmas lights Manually set the phase of the day (day, night or sunset) Permits required: Internet and GPS for the recovery of the position and the calculation of sunrise and sunset Reading and receiving sms to report the arrival of new messages on the mailbox Do you have a problem? description: "Scientific Calculator 3D Free" is a powerful math tool for Android consists of 5 calculators. "Matrix Calculator", a tool to calculate the decompositions and various operations on matrix, "Equation Solver" an instrument capable of solving equations of degree n, "Graphing Calculator" a real scientific graphing calculator can draw graphs in 2D and 3D, "Currency Converter" a currency converter always updated with the new exchange rates and "Unit Converter" a small units converter. In addition we find a comfortable Periodic Table of Elements. Features in detail: -Matrix Calculator: --Derived Quantities Determinant Rank Inverse PseudoInverse --Decompositions Cholesky decomposition LU decomposition whit pivoting QR decomposition SVD - Singular Values decomposition Eigenvalues - Eigenvectors --Linear Systems Linear Systems M N -Graphing Calculator: --Sample expressions variable evaluation: pi function evaluation: sin(0) variable definition: a=3.5 function definition: f(x)=x^2-1 parentheses: (1-x)^2 --Logarithms and power sqrt(x): square root; x^0.5 cbrt(x): cube root; x^(1/3) exp(x): exponential; e^x log(x), ln(x): natural logarithm log2(x), lb(x): binary logarithm log10(x), lg(x): decimal logarithm log(base,x): arbitrary base logarithm --Trigonometric - radians sin(x), cos(x), tan(x) asin(x), acos(x), atan(x) --Trigonometric - degrees sind(x), cosd(x), tand(x) asind(x), acosd(x), atand(x) --Hyperbolic sinh(x), cosh(x), tanh(x) asinh(x), acosh(x), atanh(x) --Other gcd(x,y): greatest common divisor comb(n,k): combinations perm(n,k): permutations min(x,y), max(x,y) floor(x), ceil(x) abs(x): absolute value sign(x): signum rnd(): random value from [0,1). rnd(max): random value from [0, max). gamma(x): (x-1)! mod(x,y): modulo --Complex numbers i or j is the complex base. Example: i*i (1+i)^2 e^(i*pi) --Operators + - × ÷ basic arithmetic ^ power % percent ! factorial # modulo √ square root ' first derivative --Binary, octal, hexadecimal Value converter in binary, octal or hexadecimal input prefixing respectively 0b, 0o, 0x, in decimal. binary: 0b1010 octal: 0o17 hexa: 0x100 --Derivative It is possible to compute the first derivative of a function with one argument using the prime notation: log'(5). The prime mark (quote) must appear immediately after the name of the function, and must be followed by open-parentheses. The derivative may be plotted e.g. sqrt'(x). To compute the derivative of an expression you must define the expression as a named function. Eg f (x) = x ^ 2 + x, after insertion, type f '(x) to display the graph of the derivative. --Multi plot To plot multiple functions on the same 2d graph, simply enter them on the same line separated by ";". --Special Function Limit Calculator Indefinite Integrals Derivative Definite Integrals Taylor Series Tangent Line ArcLength & SurfaceArea Formula Tables --Graph (MultiPlot up to 6 functions) Graph of parametric functions Graph in polar coordinates MultiPlot 3D --Widget Calculator Say about us http://appszoom.com/android_applications/tools/bismag-calculator-3d_czsgc.html http://www.androidworld.it/2013/05/25/italia-chiama-android-bismag-calculator-3d-speeder-nasoni-ditalia-159363/# Facebook: http://www.facebook.com/pages/BisMag-dev/423719257659310 "BisMag Scientific Graphing Calculator 3D"is a demo version of "BisMag Calculator 3D" if the product is to your liking and you find it useful try the PRO version. scientific calculator, scientific calculator app, grapher, graphic calculator, integration, derivative, mathematica, matlab, mathcad, complex numbers, plotting, graph plot, plotter, calculation, symbolic calculations, graphing calculator, study of function, asymptote, derive, arity, symja
release_text: - App completely revised and improved - Added support for multiple screens - Improved the visibility of the keyboard in "graphing calculator" for screens with dpi > 240 - View graph also in landscape - Added multi plot 3d graph, polar coordinate graph, parametric coordinate graph - Added derivative, definite integrals, arc length & surface area, taylor series. - Added Indefinite Integrals and Limit calculator - Periodic Table - Widget - Keyboard improved - Bugs fixed

description: This app offer an easy way to configure and use the well known OpenVPN. There is not needed to have the root access, because the VPN tun device is handled with the VpnService API introduced with Android 4.0 (ICS). Now with IPv4 tap device support without root permission! Not affected by TLS heartbeat read overrun (CVE-2014-0160) * tap device support! (IPv4 only) * obfsproxy support! (obfs2) * VLAN 802.1Q support * Auto connect on boot * Auto connect/pause/disconnect on WiFi/Mobile/WiMAX up/down * App filter (Require Android >= 5.0) * Tasker/Locale plugin * Widgets * Import/export openvpn configuration * Import pem, der, pkcs12 cetfificate formats * Support for certificates in KeyChain * IPv6 support * Support for HTTP/SOCKS proxies * Support for customized HTTP headers * Backup/restore configuration Join to the OpenVPN Client community ( https://plus.google.com/u/0/communities/115310249264827900069 ) and you will able to try the beta versions, read the news about the app and much more... Some hints to test the app: * To import a openvpn configuration file, copy the ovpn file on the device memory and put in the same folder any external certificates/keys files. Then start the app, tap on "+" button in bottom right corner and choose "Import VPN profile". After the import, the files can be deleted. * If something goes wrong, check the log. You can see the log by tapping on the vpn name, and so on the LOG tab. * If the log has errors like "ERROR: Cannot open TUN/TAP" or "Tun device open exception: java.lang.NullPointerException", please try to reboot the device. * If you have the access on the server side, check the log also on this side. * Maybe your configuration is not compatible with the last version of openvpn, so try to set the option "Use old stable OpenVPN 2.3.2" in the "Options" section. * If you cannot resolve the troubles, please send me a e-mail to android@colucci-web.it , I will contact you at soon as possible and I will help you to solve the problem or I will refund your money The new app filter feature can be used only on Android versions greater or equal than 5.0 (Lollipop). This feature allow to choose which apps are allowed to use the vpn. The apps not allowed will use networking as if the VPN wasn't running.
release_text: 2.14.40 * New custom options "rcvbuf/sndbuf" 2.14.39 * New option to use NTLM/NTLM2 as authentication mode for the HTTP proxy 2.14.38 * New option "Disable auto connect" This option allow to temporarily disable the auto connect features. This option can be found in the global Settings (start the app, tap on the device menu button, tap on "Settings"). * New option "Set MAC address" This option allow to set a custom MAC address used by the tap device.

Take part in surveys offered by the editors and 'on your Chronicle, Politics, Economics and Entertainment; - Send your videos with the app 16mm! TG5, the app video news updated 24 hours on 24!
