description: Pre-Surgical Cardiac Assessment is a program for medical use. Its aim is to deliver information on the management of cardiovascular risk before noncardiac surgery. There is also a practical protocol to assess whether a patient requires cardiac evaluation before noncardiac surgery.

This application provides information related to the pathologies "GES". Explicit Health Guarantees (GES) correspond to a government program implemented in Chile. All conditions set out their respective definitions, built-in diagnostics, access, opportunity, study, treatment and monitoring as appropriate. This program is essential for all health professional that you place your performance in Chile.

Comunity Aquired Pneumonia or NAC is a medical software for the evaluation of gravity on this disease. It contains multiple scores of frecuently use on the medical practice. It is a essential app for all physicians with android phones. It also provides information obtained from the ATS and Consensur II, about the treatment of Pneumonia.

Our Marvel Superheroes app is a listing of Marvel Characters, Equipment, Vehicles, Descriptions, and Definitions, all found in the Marvel Comic Universe. Each character mentioned has a very detailed biography talking about their powers, strengths, weaknesses, arch enemies, and even which comic issues they can be found in.

Jump and run with Lep in this award-winning platformer through 120 exciting levels. More than 100 million players to date can't be wrong.  5/5 “This side-scroller is simply phenomenal!” 5/5 “If you're looking for a cool jump and run that will mesmerize you for weeks, Lep's World 3 is your best choice.” Lep’s World 3 is a classic platform game that combines old school game play with modern playability. It's a beautiful sunny day in Leprechaun Village. Lep and his friends are enjoying the sun. But suddenly dark clouds approach and lightning illuminates the sky. Evil trolls appear, who steal the elves' gold and kidnap all the villagers. Lep is the only one who escapes. Now it is Lep's task alone to save his friends and family. Help him defeat the nasty trolls in this beautiful adventure. Jump and run through Lep's World 3 and enjoy yourself on 5 terrific, wonderfully designed worlds with 120 levels.  Lep’s World 3 stands out with: • Wonderful high-resolution graphics • Easy, intuitive controls • 120 levels • 18 items and abilities  • 22 cunning opponents  • 5 challenging final enemies  • 4 different characters • Rankings for you and your friends • Multi-player on Facebook • Classic platform game style Join us on the Lep's World 2 Facebook Page: http://bit.ly/LepsWorldFB Follow us on Twitter: https://twitter.com/LepsWorld For more informations visit Lep's World 3 homepage: http://www.lepsworld3.com We hope you enjoy the game. Have fun!! :)
release_text: -------------- Version 1.7 -------------- UPDATE -------------------------------------------- + performance improved - completely new game engine + game balance improved + bug fixes + display resolution fixes --------------------------------------------

description: "Lep's World" is a legendary platformer, with nearly 100 million downloads! So, get in on the fun! Be nimble... be quick... and help Lep find his gold in this beautiful adventure. It's hidden in a range of awesomely well-designed levels, and he's determined to find it all! 5/5 - "The best game ever! I love it so much, I can't stop playing it!" 5/5 - "It's a lot of fun, regardless of your age!" 5/5 - “This side-scroller is simply phenomenal!” Lep's World features: + 56 well-designed levels + Fabulous animations and in-game graphics + 5 different world themes + 9 challenging enemies + Classic platform game style Lep’s World is a classic platform game that combines old school game play with modern playability. Lep the leprechaun has lost his gold, so to find it he needs you to help him run and jump through the fantastical realms of Lep's World. Be careful, though. This place is full of beastly monsters, and they'll do everything they can to stop little Lep. If you collect a cloverleaf, Lep's health grows. Ah, but health alone won't keep Lep out of trouble. Even an angry bee could sting him! Use your smooth, easy moves to guide Lep on his adventure. It's "forty shades o' fun"! Need technical support? Want to send us suggestions? Just contact us at any time at support@lepsworld3.com or http://www.LepsWorld3.com Already a fan? LIKE US: http://bit.ly/LepsWorldFB FOLLOW US: https://twitter.com/LepsWorld VISIT US: http://www.nerByte.com
release_text: Thank you for your positive feedback! ******* ******* ******* bug fixes ************ + Android TV support + game controller support + improved controls + smoother animations and better performance + Lep's World 3 is on Google Play for FREE!

description: Tin Man Games presents Gary Chalk’s Gun Dogs, a gamebook with art by the legendary illustrator Gary Chalk, famed for his work on the legendary Lone Wolf series. Co-creating Gun Dogs is Jamie Wallis of Greywood Publishing. You have been charged with treason against the Empire and placed on death row. The Emperor offers you a choice: die a slow and humiliating death or serve as a Gun Dog, a soldier assigned impossible missions and tethered by a magical collar. The collar will choke you to death if you disobey your mission orders. You will be sent where an army cannot go and an angel would fear to tread. You are expendable. You are a Gun Dog. ** REVIEWS ** "Packed with action, intrigue, and gore - and excellently told and illustrated by Wallis and Chalk, respectively - Gun Dogs could well be Tin Man's most accomplished gamebook to date." - POCKET GAMER - 9/10 - GOLD Award! "In a sense it’s a familiar world for those used to Fighting Fantasy tales, but refreshingly, this is a story one hasn’t traveled along before. It remains at the same level of quality however, with the artwork proving a particular delight. Fans of the Lone Wolf books will particularly appreciate the work, given both come from the same illustrator." - 148 APPS - 4/5 "Presents a detailed and pleasingly old-school fantasy world, bought vividly to life with Gary Chalk’s excellent artwork. Fun and quick to play through, with decent replay value." - GAMEZEBO - 4/5 "The fact that Gary Chalk, the illustrator behind the original Lone Wolf books, is involved in this production is more than enough to get interested in Tin Man Games' newest release. The fact that it's an amazingly-written story is more than enough to keep you playing it over and over again." - DIGITALLY DOWNLOADED - 4/5 ** FEATURES ** •Includes all the interactive reading and gameplay features found in the previous Gamebook Adventures titles. •Take out foes with your Gun Dog’s three-chambered pistol – the latest in the Empire’s technology! •Awesome artwork by Gary Chalk brings the Empire of the Five Cities to life! •Read the story and dictate the direction of the story! Options based on who you have met, where you have visited and what you have found. •Lots of achievements to collect and artwork to find throughout the book. These are placed on your achievement wall. •Three difficulty levels. Read the book casually by being able to move around freely or crank up the difficulty and be an advanced gamebook player. •Auto-mapping tracks your progress across the Steppe! Gary Chalk’s Gun Dogs has been created using Tin Man Games’ critically acclaimed Gamebook Adventures Engine featuring: •Read the book horizontally or vertically on your tablet. •An automated Adventure Sheet to keep track of stats and inventory. •Realistic physics based dice rolling. Shake your device! Artwork gallery. Find an illustration in the gamebook and be able to access it full-screen forever. •Bookmarking system which saves your position in the gamebook, much like putting your fingers between the pages to remember your previous page when reading old-school gamebooks! •Specially composed soundtrack and sound effects.

We have a lot of game modes: - A board where you can answering questions and winning star of all categories to win your opponents (for 2-6 players) to trivial style. - Make tic tac toe against your opponent answering questions. First wins! - Play a challenge mode game and answering 20 questions. Win one more hit. Factory questions. Here you can ask your own questions and put them in the game Want to be aware of the latest news? facebook: http://www.facebook.com/atriviate twitter: https://twitter.com/atriviate web: www.atriviate.com keywords: trivial pursuit trivia quiz multiplayer triviados friends QuizClash crack jeopardy quizup mico academy

The idea is simple: start at wave 1 and survive for as long as possible! But watch out, some asteroids aren't as nice as they first seem. There is now a donate version of AstroBlast, for if you're feeling generous. It's identical to this version of the game (without the ad): https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=badger.ati.astroblast.donate There is no limit to the maximum wave you can reach, so enjoy destroying asteroids that have different abilities, across 6 modes of difficulty (are you mad enough to try Hardcore mode?). Competitive? Excellent! See if you can reach the top of the leaderboard against your friends. You can even share you score to social networking sites such as Facebook and Twitter. There is also now a Global Leaderboard system so you can compete against people from around the world! Want to make the game harder? You can disable the thrust in the options menu so you can no longer dodge! And now, you can decide how the waves play out! Select 'Free Play' mode from the main menu and you can select options such as: * Asteroids in play. * Rarity of the special asteroids. * Starting and Maximum amount of asteroids as you progress through the stages. Note: currently the Facebook app has a bug on it which will not pre-fill your status with the required text. We are working on a work around until Facebook fix this issue. (Feeling completely crazy? Why not create stages of nothing but Cyan Asteroids with a rarity of 100%, and a start and max limit of 20 on Hardcore difficulty. Basically, it's a Danmaku game now!)

No jogo, haverá um questionário. A cada pergunta, haverá quatro alternativas para que você acerte a resposta. Em cada fase, há dez perguntas. Para passar de fase é necessário acertar todas no tempo estipulado pelo jogo. Há cada fase, o grau de dificuldade aumentará. Além de ser um jogo educativo e divertido, te ajudará a aumentar o leque de conhecimentos. Desafie-se e veja até onde você é capaz de chegar! Características: Disponível somente em Português. In the game, there will be a quiz. With each question there will be four alternatives for you to hit reply. At each stage, there are ten questions. To complete a level you must hit all the time stipulated by the game. There each phase, the degree of difficulty increases. Besides being an educational and entertaining game will help you to increase the pool of knowledge. Challenge yourself and see how far you can get! Characteristics: Available only in Portuguese.

Create and decorate the dollhouse of your dreams with My Doll House! Pick your favorite houses or castles and give them your personal touch with over a hundred different and beautiful items for every kind of room you can imagine. Don’t forget to add cute dolls, puppies and kitties to play with! Use your creativity to design incredible living rooms, bedrooms, bathrooms, kitchens and much more. When you are done, take a picture of your lovely house or room to save it forever and share it with your best friends! My Doll House brings back all the magic, fantasy and enjoyment of the dollhouses. Download now and start having fun! HIGHLIGHTS • Incredibly cute illustrations • Designed for all ages • Over 100 exclusive decoration items for your dollhouse including: tables, chairs, windows, wallpapers, beds, wardrobes, bookshelves, lamps, plants, plush animals, ovens, refrigerators, clocks, mirrors, paintings, posters, televisions and more • Different house models • Cute dolls, puppies and kitties Please note! This game is free to play, but it contains items that can be purchased for real money. Some features and extras mentioned in the description may also have to be purchased for real money.

Tasks brings the full Google Tasks experience to Android.   * Sync with Google Tasks at the core * Sync with Google Tasks is not just another bullet point in an endless feature list, but lies at the heart of the application. Our goal is to bring all the features you are enjoying online to your Android device.   * Tuned to the whole Android ecosystem * Tasks uses the modern design language introduced with Android 4.0 Ice Cream Sandwich throughout the application. However, that doesn’t mean that we compromise on compatibility, as we made sure that Tasks runs on Android 2.2 or later. And whether you have a phone, a tablet or anything in between, the UI just feels right for the screen you are holding in your hands.   * Additional Features * Due date reminders Widgets Multiple Google accounts Light and dark theme Integration into Android sharing system Sort by rearranging or by due date   * Versions * Next to the paid version we also offer a free, ad-supported version which will start showing ads after 10 days. Both versions offer the same functionality and features. You won’t lose any data if you decide to upgrade from the free to the paid version as all the data is synced with Google Tasks.   * Move to SD card not supported due to problems with widgets *

description: A 3D version -Don't tap the white tile- has come!! New awsome graphic, New different gameplay Watch your step, DON'T TOUCH ANY WHITE TILE. This is the core rule in this additive game. Is it easy? Everyone can handle it, but not everyone can handle it well. What about you? There are five modes in the game: -Classic mode, get 30 dark tiles as soon as possible. -Arcade mode, try your best to tap the dark tiles as many as you can, and do not miss one. -Zen mode, try your best to tap the black tiles as many as you can in 30 seconds.

*** I HAVE A SEPARATE GUIDE OUT FOR MORTAL KOMBAT X NOW, CHECK IT OUT IF YOU ARE LOOKING FOR THE GUIDE FOR MKX!! *** Be the first on your block to have all of the latest and greatest moves for the all new Mortal Kombat! Released for Xbox 360 and PS3 in 2011, the Klassic Kombatants are back! With this guide you have quick access to the following: - Basik Attacks - Unique normals per character! - Special Attacks - Including fireballs and teleports! - Super Meter Attacks - Enhanced, Tag, and X-Ray Attacks! - Kombos - All the kombos you need! - Finishing moves, including Stage Fatalities and Babalities! - Notes - Take individual notes for each character and save it for later viewing! - The Kryptionary - A full list of the items and locations in the Krypt. Included are the above for all 27 characters in both versions, as well as Kratos who is exclusive to PS3. *** You can now also change the button icons to the liking of your choice! Simply press the MENU button on your phone to bring up the preferences screen, then make your selection, and press BACK to go to the main menu and you will now see the icons of your liking! Choose from the following: - Mortal Kombat Button Icons - Numbered button Icons - Xbox 360 Default Button Icons - Playstation 3 Default Button Icons UPDATES: There have already been announcements that this game will have DLC and in the future you will receive the DLC character updates for free! Well what are you waiting for, get the app and have all of your moves at the tip of your fingers! Absolutely no network connection is required once you have downloaded this application! Enjoy it in the dark dungeons of the basement where no reception is available! Legal Disclaimer: This app is not an official guide or at all associated with the game's developer or publisher. All descriptions, graphics, and information are copyright to their respective owners and usage for this app falls within fair use guidelines. All graphics used in this app are 100% user created. This app is created solely for the creators love of the game and to help others further develop their skills at the game.

description: Version History: v1.2 - Fixed a couple of crashing issues, sorry for the inconvenience! - Fixed crashing issue when certain spell levels were expanded - Fixed crashing issue when favorites were marked (resulted from same issue as above) v1.1 - Added material from Ultimate Magic - Fixes Oracle spell list so that it also includes Cleric spells - Resist Energy was missing and should be available now v1.0 - App released This app provides convenient access to the spells currently available from the Pathfinder Core Rules, Advanced Players Guide, and several other sources. Additional features: - The ability to filter spells by school, types of saves allowed, casting time, etc. - Select your favorite spells and view them in the favorites window Thanks to the Pathfinder SRD for providing the spell data! http://www.d20pfsrd.com/ This app is currently in beta, feel free to shoot me an email if you encounter any issues you'd like resolved. ChicaneryGames@gmail.com NOTE: When you load spells for the first time or when the app is updated, it may take a minute or so to initialize the database. Thanks for your patience!

What advice did our Christian forefathers have for us? What did they have to say about faith, prayer, suffering, and knowing God's will? Each day this small app, Christian Quotes - Daily Advice from our Spiritual Fathers, will give you insight into the hearts of over 20 saints whose lives span almost 2,000 years. From Augustine to Tozer, Kempis to Murray, all share their hearts with you. Be discipled daily by the most influential Christians in history. Download the app to find out what the ancients have been whispering to you through the ages. Be led each day by the maxims of the saints. - Swipe to see previous day's quotes. - "Favorite" quotes to refer to later. - Set daily quote to notify you at the desired time each day. - Choose your background and text colors. - Share quotes to many other apps, text or email (Facebook requires paste).

Added Pause Menu To All Game Modes New Flight School Game Mode Your left engine failed on you and you had to make an emergency landing in a hot desert you will have to use all your skills as a pilot to get your airplane in the sky again.and back to the big city airport. Take to Skys in the most Realistic Flying simulator on android !! Test your Pilot skills in Flight School Missions Fly like a real pilot in over 50 kilometers of land !! All Aircraft have Realistic moving landing gear rudder and wings at the touch of a button! Airplane Flight Simulator 3D – Game features -New controls layout -New Moving cockpit controls -Flight School Levels -Realistic Flying -Four switchable camera views -Free look camera -Take off or Land using Real landing gear -Smooth analog stick Flying control -Massive 3D environment with over 50 kilometers To fly over -Massive City -Smooth dynamic gameplay -Flying simulator Control setup -Left Stick- Hold up to throttle up Hold down to throttle Down Hold Left or right to roll airplane -Right Stick- Hold up to Pitch upwards Hold down to Pitch Downwards Hold Left or right to steer airplane -Touch Buttons- Left camera icon to switch camera views Right cam button touch and rotate for free look Left wheel landing gear button tap to activate or deactivate Right Engine on off Switch.Hold for a couple of seconds to start engines B button for Aircraft Brakes Coming soon -More Aircraft -Airport Missions

description: TETRIS FOR WORDS. An addictive tile based word game to test your lexical skills combined with speed and strategy. Use a variety of stationery like ink bottles, erasers, scissors and dusters in different modes to make as many words as possible before the board fills up. --------------------- VERSION 1.1 --------------------- *STATIONERY SHOP An endless supply of stationery to make more words and increase your game time to longer durations! ------------------ FEATURES ------------------ SOCIAL LEADERBOARDS Look up online leader boards to help you keep track of who is the best in the world. Brag to your friends by posting your scores to Facebook. Keep track of your personal high score and compare your scores with your friends and the rest of the world! STATIONERY AND BOOSTER MODES 4 power-ups and 4 modes to help increase your scores and challenge your friends, including ways to extend your game time, find longer words, and much more! Use inks, erasers, scissors and dusters to remove tiles from the board to play longer and score higher. Earn even more points with special modes to double/triple points per word, slow down falling tiles and more points for vowels! ACHIEVEMENTS 20 achievements to be unlocked! Make as many words to score more points and unlock achievements! STAMPS Get stamps for every game you play. Collect them all! STATIC BOARD Get 10 seconds on a static board at the end of every game to make more words! UNIQUE BOARDS Each game has a unique game board leading to an infinite combination of games! Woorddict uses the standard dictionary, so Scrabble and Words With Friends players can sharpen their vocabulary. BEAUTIFUL AND OPTIMIZED Woorddict is optimized for and tested on each device we support. Smooth graphics and engaging sounds make for a beautiful and exciting experience. If you are a player of games like Scrabble or Wordament, and you like playing time based word games, then Woorddict is the game for you! ------------------ PERMISSIONS: This app requires the following permissions for the following reasons: Internet Access - Submit scores, brag to your friends and read high score lists. Get Accounts and Use Credentials - Allow you to connect your Facebook account with. The information obtained is not used for any other purpose and is never transferred to any third parties. Billing - Support for in-app purchases from the stationery shop. ------------------ Love playing Woorddict? Show some more love. Like us on Facebook : https://www.facebook.com/woorddict If you find any bug, please let us know. Support email : codeandart.games@gmail.com
release_text: STATIONERY SHOP An endless supply of stationery to make more words and increase your game time to longer durations!

description: Help the Piggy in the Middle eat the apples from the mean pigs. You tap the screen multiple times to gain height and catch the apples! Eat as many apples as you can in a row to get a best score and share it with your friends. Make sure you watch out for the BOMBS! Tell us your high score in your Review! **************** FEATURES **************** - Cute graphics - One touch easy controls - Challenging - Addictive - Lots of fun - Facebook sharing - Ad supported LIKE US ON FACEBOOK: http://www.facebook.com/commotiongames FOLLOW US ON TWITTER: http://www.twitter.com/commotiongame We'd love to hear your suggestions and comments!

Saddle up your cute Russian rocket powered bear and embark on an epic journey to visit nations all around the world. Accompanied by lovely balalaika music you will gain (or regain) a vast amount of geographic knowledge.

This is a typing game: Write enemies names to get rid of them !! Learning and improving how to type with fun, and type faster for better scores. MODE STORY: unlock one by one all words categories to unlock next levels. 4 environments are currently infested by evil vampires ! Words categories are: Graveyard: "Color","Sport","Common" Misty Forest: "Animal","Stars","Plants" Ruined Castle: "Body", "Bitter biters", "Phobia" Mad Lab: "Science","Dino","Extinct species", "Medical" Each story level ends by a BOSS, that can be only killed by a famous quote! MODE ARCADE: Scoring challenge to type faster, making big scores on longer words. TIMED CHALLENGES: Beat your score on a fixed duration, perfect mode for playing in public transports! To have tested my game myself, I can assure you it will really help you to type faster^^. It helps memorize the keyboard layout, and on top of that you also learn some vocabulary. Three difficulty modes assures that casuals could access every corner of the game. By the way, hard difficulty and scoring let the game "Easy to learn, Hard to master". 3 Virtual keyboard layouts are available right now: QWERTY, DVORAK, AZERTY. You also had the option to hide the keyboard, for a very challenging blind game ! I hope you'll enjoy it, and always be free to comment !

Are you ready to become a real Snakemaster? A fully rewritten version of the successful Playstation game Snake Warriors: Training from 2010 is now available for Android. ** Challenging game that keeps you busy for many hours ** ** Most original and best Snake game for Android ** Challenging, thrilling and above all addictive gameplay in an innovative game! With its 5 game-types divided over 40 levels, Snake Warriors: Training is a game that offers hours of fun! Its diverse gameplay and near endless challenges make sure you won't get bored any time soon! Show that you are a real Snakemaster by earning all of the trophies. are you ready to become a world-class Snakemaster? - 5 Different game types - 40 Levels - 5 Activators - 27 Trophies to achieve - 3 Armors for your snake

description: ***ATTENTION**** Dominoes Pad PRO 2.0 (FREE) is available! This app has been updated to version 2.0 as a separate app. Please download Dominoes Pad Pro (FREE) from the Google Play Store. ***ATTENTION**** DominoesPad App is for Dominoes fans that want to get rid of the pencil and the paper. Keep the score of the game in this intuitive application and focus on crushing your opponent! Features: -Write game score following professional standards (Unique!) Dominoes professional scoring rule: Each team has two columns. Left column indicates a single game score while the right column indicates game total score for that team. -Share game results on Facebook. -Game Score is 0-100 points (Free Version) Upgrade to full Version to change the game score from 50 to 1000 and have an ad-free experience! If you have any suggestions or comments please rate the add and let us know! Your suggestions will be greatly considered.

See your voice, music or test your audio equipment. See whatever your microphone can hear! This real-time spectrum analyzer / audio visualizer features: - 128 high-quality frequency bands [20Hz to 22kHz] - Logarithmic frequency scale to match human perception - Low latency for high responsiveness - High framerate to see smooth frequency and amplitude movements - High performance native code using OpenGL ES 2.0 - FFT window size 2048 @ 43/58(Armv7+) frames per second Note: The internet permissions are used for ads. Any feedback is welcome.
release_text: This update improves the signal processing in general. Meanwhile, I have released my second app "liveBPM". Baby Classical is an music appreciation app that sets out to familiarize children with some of Mozart's liveliest and most playful pieces, in a fun and interactive way. A great and effective application for a child's music and brain development. Features highlight: - Contains 5 songs by Mozart for young minds stimulation and inspiration. - Colorful and animated backgrounds. - Slide or tap with your fingers on screen to simulate piano playing. - Tap on any one of the 8 animal icons and to perform along with the songs. - Edit and create your own playlist. - Set timer for app to close automatically. Songs included in Baby Classical: 1. Die Zauberflote (The Magic Flute), K. 620: Der Vogelfanger bin ich ja (arr. for 2 flutes) 2. Piano Sonata No. 16 in C major, K. 545, "Sonata facile": II. Andante 3. Die Zauberflote (The Magic Flute), K. 620: Bei Mannern, welche Liebe fuhlen (arr. for flute, oboe and piano) 4. Divertimento in D major, K. 136, "Salzburg Symphony No. 1": II. Andante 5. String Quartet No. 23 in F major, K. 590, "Prussian No. 3": II. Andante

Animaths is a fun free educational math game for preschoolers and first grade. The app contains 9 games in which kids will learn: 1. Number recognition from 0 to 9 with our friendly dog Tongy 2. Number recognition from 10 to 99 and trying to keep The Trio Tails away from those evil mouse traps 3. Number comparison from 1 to 99 while training with Peppers penguin to be a hockey champion 4. Addition from 1 to 99 (BONUS GAME SIMON SAYS!) with the graceful Speedy turtle 5. Subtraction from 1 to 99 and helping the fastest snail in the world, Gracey 6. Simple equations from 0 to 9 with Incognitox detective fox 7. Shape recognition to feed the hungriest monkey from the jungle, Shapelin 8. Time measuring with the strict boss McTimy 9. Measuring units(weight and capacity) while flying high with BlueSky Also a score is always kept in the form of achievements, wrong and correct answers so parents can check what scores are the kids getting on different math games. Learning math has never been so much fun! Let your kid meet all the friendly animals from each game: Tongy, The Trio Tails, Peppers, Speedy, Gracey, Incognitox, Shapelin, McTimy and Bluesky! Try this fun educational math app for kids now for free and if you like it or have any questions don't forget to rate and leave a comment!

description: All Praise is due to Allah(Swt) and much peace and many blessings be upon the Messenger of Allah (Muhammad(pbuh)), his family, his companions, his followers and those who disseminate his call until the Day of Judgment. Sayings of Uthman(RA) is a collection of 30+ sayings of Uthman(May Allah be pleased with him). Uthman ibn Affan was one of the companions of Prophet Muhammad(pbuh). He played a major role in early Islamic history as the third Caliph. Uthman was born into the Umayyad clan of Makkah, a powerful family of the Quraish tribe. He was a companion of Muhammad(pbuh) who assumed the role of leader (caliph) of the Muslim Empire at the age of 70 following Umar ibn al-Khattab. Under his leadership, the empire expanded into Fars in 650 (present-day Iran), some areas of Khorasan (present-day Afghanistan) in 651 and the conquest of Armenia was begun in the 640s. App Features: • 30+ Sayings of Uthman(RA) • Search box • Easy Browsing • Share Via Email • Favorites functionality • Change font size functionality • Works on android 4.0 • Universal App works almost will all Android Phones & Tabs

description: This is the first app in the world with weather, hurricane tracking, earthquakes and alerts widgets. eWeather HD is the most informative Android application about your environment: Current weather and weather forecasts from different weather providers, weather alerts, latest earthquakes, geomagnetic storm forecast, pressure change indicator, wind and moon and sun calendar, METAR. Annual archives of air temperature and sea for any city in the world allows you to choose the good time and place for the travel. You can compare the weather in the current year with the weather in the last year. Also you can always have your own opinion about the statements that has never was so cold, hot, wet, dry. Features: • Two world-renowned weather providers: Foreca and US weather provider, • 365 days weather archive, • 130,000 locations all over the world, • Solstice, Equinox, Polar night, Polar day, Solar eclipse, Lunar eclipse, • Twenty original widgets of the weather, time, moon phase, barometer, geomagnetic index, and UV index (1x1, 2x1, 2x2, 1x4, 4x1, 4x2, 3x3, 4x4, 5x2, 5x5 etc), • 126 weather alert categories. • Ten day forecast, • Sea surface temperature, • Ten notification indicators in the status bar: temperature, moon phase, earthquakes, alerts, barometer etc, • Earthquakes widget on OpenStreetMap, • Weather Alerts (Advisory, Watch, or Warning) , • Black ice and freeze warnings, • One-hundred latest earthquakes in the world on Google map, • Barometer with headache indicator, • Pressure forecast graph (Foreca only), • Moon phase, moon rise and moon set times, • Sunrise and sunset times, • Duration of the day, • World map with weather alerts, weather, earthquakes and local time. • Geomagnetic storm forecast, • Wind speed and directionality indicators in both 10-day and hour-by-hour forecasts (except Foreca), • 24 hour by hour forecast, • Current weather conditions, • Only uses 20 KBytes of internet traffic per city for each weather update, • World clock, • METAR from weather station (except Foreca), • UV index, • Precipitation probability, • Precipitation amount: rainfall and new snowfall amount, • Follow by location (uses GPS or Cell Network location determination), • Full tablet support, • Send weather forecast, weather alerts, Earthquakes by e-mail and SMS, • Alarm clock time on clock dial and graph eWeather HD: Is an easy to use, handy assistant for staying informed about changing weather conditions, Has a built-in barometer. A diagram is displayed which shows the atmospheric pressure changes for the past 24 hours. A red warning display is produced when the barometer detects changes more than 0.2 inhg. Provides information on the last 100 earthquakes from all over the world. View the latest earthquakes in a list or on a map. Provides information regarding magnitude, time and distance. You can filter earthquakes by their magnitude and distance from your location The most unique feature in this application is the “Weather Clock”. It provides all of the previous information in an hour-by-hour clock format and is very interactive, informative and fun to use. Check it out! eWeather HD is recommended for those who are interested in weather, astronomy, aviation, hunting, fishing, travel, own or work on a farm or ranch, a private or vacation home, or work or play in a weather-sensitive environment or industry... the list goes on and on! Payment is one time, no ads, no any in-app payment, free updates.

Traffic Warden is a Traffic Management Game. You control the city's traffic lights. You have to ensure that traffic keeps on flowing and no accidents take place. Jewels Blitz is one of the best android puzzle game and casual game supporting all popular mobile phones. Destroy gems by creating lines of 3 or more gems of the same kind. You clear a level when gems have been destroyed at all the positions. Move the gems by using the mouse to click and swap adjacent gems. app_name: Curious Kid and Toy Car Game
description: Is your child curious about how toys work and what’s inside of them? If yes, Curious Kid & the Toy Car app is exactly for your kid! In this educational game we give your child the opportunity to take apart an RC toy car and get familiar with how it works! With every play children become better do-it-yourselfers fluent in handling a screwdriver and little specialists that know every part of the car. And there’s the added benefit of never having to worry about missing pieces. At the beginning of the game your child needs to pick a toy car. There’s a choice between a blue racing car and a pink one. Once the car’s selected the fun begins. Try and dismantle its parts by unscrewing and detaching them from the RC car. During this great fun kids can observe how things like steering system or driving gear work, learn their names and function. The next step is to put the RC toy car back together, it’s like a puzzle game where you need to drag motor, wheels, spoiler and other parts over to the right place. Success is rewarded with a great race game! All that kids need to do is to pick the car and put the pedal down, but watch out, don’t drive too fast and stay in the lane! We’ve designed this game together with educators and parents to provide safe environment that allows exploration and inspires learning! If you have a child aged 5-9 years this game is a must! Follow us on Twitter or Facebook and know more about upcoming games in Curious Kid Game series! https://www.facebook.com/GalanteGames https://twitter.com/Galante_Games
release_text: See our new race track! Have fun taking car apart. Play and learn! Find out how car works!

description: In Zombie Attack: Apocalypse nothing stands between you and the zombies, you must resist! Choose among fully upgradeable weapons and power-ups, from a simple pistol to the deadly flamethrower! Shield yourself from the zombies and resist, use your coins wisely, upgrade your base, and try to survive more days than anyone else. Do you have what it takes to survive? Defend your base or get eaten! In a world after the apocalypse undead and zombies are the only thing left, try to stop them before you become a corpse too! After refusing to leave your home, it has become your base! Hunt down every corpse to upgrade your base, buy turrets and make it into an unreachable stronghold! Your survival depends on it! Aim and shoot precisely if you want to survive in this entertaining and intense action-packed game! If you love action and shooting games, you will be addicted to Zombie Attack! Zombie Attack: Apocalypse features a lot of weapons and different kinds of enemies: ★ Pistol, Shotgun, Uzi, Rocket Launcher, Crossbow, Flamethrower, and more to come! ★ Different kinds of undead: Walking Zombie, Shooting Corpse, Exploding Undead, and more! ★ Power ups such as a Glue Bomb and a special Shield! ★ Turrets with automatic aiming ★ Upgrade system for every item, earn coins in your survival and spend them upgrading your equipment! Zombie Attack: Apocalypse is addicting and challenging at the same time, resisting the attacks from the zombies is not easy, but it's not frustrating either! It's a game for everyone, casual players won't find it unreachable and experienced players will still get a challenge from it. Try it now! Shooting is as simple as touching the screen. Using the Shield and the Glue Bomb is as easy as clicking a button too! Select your weapon, touch anywhere to aim and you will shoot! Every weapon has special characteristics: the Uzi shoots faster, the Crossbow has multi-shot and can pierce, the Flamethrower has continuous fire, etc.! Be sure to try them all and choose the best one to survive in every situation, only then you can resist! Aim for the zombies and destroy them before they can attack you. You can also use the Glue Bomb or your Shield when the situation becomes too dangerous! If you like tower defense and wall defense games, or games where you earn money and manage your upgrades, then Zombie Attack: Apocalypse is your game! Try it once and become addicted, you won't be able to stop! What are you waiting for? Start your adventure in this entertaining, addicting and action-packed game now!

description: This app gives you the next scheduled departure times from all Path stations for trains going to your destination. The app lists the times for the next 5 trains to your destination from New York or New Jersey. Once you have specified your destination from the 13 stops in the Port Authority Trans Hudson rail network, the app lists the departure times for the next trains from the other stops. The weekday, weekend, and holiday schedules are stored on your phone, so it works underground. Newark & Harrison times to midtown Manhattan If you make connections in Newark or Harrison, please consider purchasing the Path Destinations Premium app. By including the transfers at Journal Square, the Premium app tells you when to catch the Path in midtown Manhattan to arrive on time in Newark or Harrison. The Path Destinations Premium app also gives you easy access to New Jersey Transit train departure screens at Newark and Hoboken. Above ground, Path Destinations Premium also gives you one click access to the latest service alerts issued by the Path. The app developer is not affiliated with the Path or the Port Authority of New York and New Jersey.

This is the only app which tells you when to board the Path in midtown Manhattan to catch a New Jersey Transit train in Newark. This app gives you the upcoming scheduled departure times from all Path stations for trains going to your destination including transfer information at Journal Square. The app lists the times for the next 5 trains to your destination from New York or New Jersey. The weekday, weekend, and holiday schedules are stored on your phone, so it works underground. As a bonus, with a single click you get real-time New Jersey Transit departure screens for Newark and Hoboken. If you are above ground, you can click a button to retrieve the latest service alerts from the Path . If you are taking a train at Newark or Hoboken, you may want to consider purchasing the New Jersey Transit Departures app or the My Amtrak Trip app. The app developer is not affiliated with the Path (Port Authority Trans Hudson), the Port Authority of New York and New Jersey, or New Jersey Transit.

Stunt Truck Racing blasts into the air with a fresh take on physics based hill climb racing. It's all about high speeds, big air tricks, and plenty of panel busting crashes. Can you build the ultimate racer and become a stunt champion? ★★★★★ "Best racing game ever off-roading! Better than Hill Climb racing" - Anneliese Jugo - Beat the clock as you race from checkpoint to checkpoint. - Car damage - Send panels flying as you crash into the ground. Don't lose too many or the car will explode! - 11 Racers to mod in 3 size classes, all the way from Golf Carts to SUVs. - Stunt system: perform wheelies and mid air tricks to get extra coins. - Upgrade engine performance, wheel grip and handling. - Customisable wheels and panel kits - Ride in style. - Race offroad through forests, snowy mountains, deserts and cities. - Choose your driver from a list of crazy racers. - Realistic engine sound system.
release_text: You can now collect gems by watching videos!

description: The cheating Prince has ruined the Princess's "Happily Ever After" and run off with most of the Kingdom's gold! Bring out your big guns and take back what is yours! Knock the prince and his mistresses silly, collect coins, take on challenge levels, and unlock fun new stages in this hilarious, physics/tower defense game! Key features: • Procedural levels • Fun physics-based gameplay • Creative enemies, block designs, and level layouts • Funny character animations • Beautiful 2D stylized art • Time of day change. Watch the world change from morning to night • Upgradable super attacks to help clear obstacles quickly • Awesome soundtrack by composer David Levy • 4 cannons to upgrade and blast the Prince with • Free updates with new levels and enemies
release_text: Added new world map. Fixed performance problem when spawning coins from chest and mistress. Fixed some bugs.

description: Caller Location Display is a perfect application for you. For every incoming call you receive, it will display location of caller, with City, State information and it will be displayed on the map also. Are you always worried when you receive calls from unknown numbers, then do not worry now, the information will be displayed like area or from which state call is originating. Do you want to track caller location then go for this application, it is a mobile call tracker. No need of internet connection after you download this application. Custom wallpapers you can choose from. Call Location will help you to determine if you want to pick calls or not. Please note that this application tracks mobile number of USA, Canada and India only and some mobile numbers which are ported may not be traceable by this application.

Are you looking for a virtual Piano, then this is your one stop application, you can learn real Piano skills. Use this app to learn to play piano with realistic instrument sounds. Perfect Piano Teacher is one of the cool effortless piano apps on Play Store ! Now you can play your favorite songs instantly and that too without any practice. Features: ✓ Studio quality sound ✓ 7 sound effects ✓ Available for all Android phones ✓ Record and playback to create & share your masterpiece with friends and family ✓ Volume Button right away ✓ Realistic feeling ✓ This is just a perfect Piano Keyboard for your phone ✓ Localized to more than 25 languages. Any feedback is welcome and appreciated.

description: CLARC. An actiony puzzle adventure. With drunk robots. ● Won the German Computer Games Award for "Best Mobile Game 2014"! ● [4.5 of 5] "CLARC is a terrific little game with a lot of heart. It's gorgeous, meaty, packed with a variety of clever puzzles, and challenging." - toucharcade.com ● [4.5 of 5] "An enchanting experience that you need to discover for yourself. I highly recommend this game" - appadvice.com This grid-based genre mix combines complex spatial puzzles with arcade style action elements and an epic storyline. As the story unfolds, the nerdy forklift robot Clarc will encounter partying robots, attractive nuclear missiles and intoxicated supercomputers. He sets out to repair his production facility on Mars and fights to rescue his friends from the intruding spaceship, M.O.T.H.E.R. FEATURES ● 100 brain-teasing puzzles in ● 25 large levels ● 12 hours of gameplay ● High-definition comic visuals ● Dozens of interactive elements ● Advanced enemy AI ● English, German, French, Spanish, Russian and Italian language support ● Google Play Games – Achievements ● Cloud Sync for game progress ● Level Skip Cheat ● No annoying micro-transactions! ● CLARC's rich visuals are optimized for TABLETS ● featured in the TegraZone with a special THD version for nVidia Shield IMPORTANT Please note that CLARC's rich visuals are optimized for newer devices. ● Requirements: DualCore CPU 1.2GHz, 1GB RAM, 4" Display, Android 4.0 or higher. ● Recommended: Tegra3, Snapdragon S4 / 400 / 600 / 800, Exynos 4210 or higher. ● Please check the free levels in CLARC lite before purchasing!

description: Gujarati Jain Panchang or Gujarati Jain Calender (2014-2015) is mobile application with many user friendly feature. Gujarati Jain Calendar is developed by Experian Infotech (previously RD Consultancy) for Matoshri Kantaben Rasiklal Sanghvi Parivar Sankul which is being constructed at Girnar Taleti of Junagadh District in Gujarat. Highlight of Gujarati Jain Calendar (2014-2015) Day Information in Gujarati like, Kalyanak, Panchak, Guru Pushya Nakshatra, Subh Asubh Day, Tithi Days of the month, Gujarati Jain Calendar with English Month view and many more.... Gujarati Jain Calendar (2014-2015) also make it easy to know Navkarshi timings based on your selected location and you can view Mahurat / Choghadiya of respective place. Jain Calendar 2014 have Pachkan Audio which will help you take Pachakkan as and when required. You will get Tithi and other notifications too
release_text: Added data for Tithi 1 and Tithi 2 for 2015-2016

description: Head to the exciting adventure of prehistoric park world of Pterodactyl where you encounter other raid dinosaurs and cavemen. Dive into this fun game with beautiful graphics and great music. Fly through the island jungle filled with deadly rocks and water monsters. Eat water jacks and worms to refill your health. You have to snipe into the water, because fishes can swim away. The application contains randomly generated obstacles. You have a choice of two different modes out of which the one called "Fly" contains a unique controlling. There is a link to Facebook where you can share results with your friends The game is free. Every kid loves Jurassic dinosaurs The principle of this wild game is similar to other run games, but here you fly. The whole world is rendered from 3D scene, so it gives more realistic appeal. Life in this era is one big venture rush, that means no paradise. You become a defender of your whole life. You will fight an everyday battle to survive, escaping from one danger to another. You have to get a craft to became skilled enough to finish the level.

** No adverts or In-App-Purchases. No data collection - please see our privacy policy ** Thank you to all those who have helped support the work by purchasing the apps Animated shapes and sounds to entertain your child. Touching the screen creates a kaleidoscope of colors and sounds. Use Settings to change options for playing music and/or sounds I wrote it for my 1 year old son. As he got older, the Baby Moving Shapes app, was still entertaining but at times he wanted something faster paced. The screenshots really don't do it justice. It's the animation and movement when kids touch the screen that really gets their attention. If you like it, please review it. I do appreciate feedback and consider any suggestions made.

description: This is the best App for android in its kind because it offers three different appearances based on your preferences: original chess clock, analog and digital. Use it in your games, with this app you can limit the time spent in each player’s move, count the total amount of moves and display the player’s name. You can find different time modes to play with this app, such as select between Fischer, Bronstein and Simple delay, Sudden Death, Byo-yomi, Canadian and Scrabble with an option to show the penalty after the time ends. You will find configurable vibration and sounds effects for the clock timer, ticking, click, end of game and end of delays. And the best is that you can download this application for free in this app store. This is a customizable application that you can download for FREE in this app store. Highlights: • Three different clock types: Simple, Analog and Digital. • Many time modes: Sudden Death, Scrabble, Simple Delay, Fischer, Bronstein, Canadian and Byo-yomi 秒読み. • Configurable sound effects and vibration. • Intuitive and easy to use menus. • Display names and move count. • Optimized for Xperia Play, press the L, R buttons to play.

You want the REAL radar data, not smoothed approximations claiming to be high definition? You have come to the right place! With unmatched customization, it's why PYKL3Radar is the highest rated radar viewer for Android! PYKL3 Radar (pronounced Pickle Radar) was the first and remains the most advanced, yet simple to use, level 3 radar viewer for Android for United States radar information. It is intended for users who want more out of a weather radar viewer...much more! PYKL3Radar also gives you surface observation plots (ground truth), satellite imagery, and virtually every National Weather Service text product wrapped with a highly customizable experience. Designed with storm chasers, spotters, and emergency management officials in mind, PYKL3 continues to push the limits of what is possible on Android by embracing the ideas of a very active user community. PYKL3 is the only Android viewer with customizable colors, including the radar color table. What's more, your location is constantly displayed right on top of the radar imagery. PYKL3 Radar is the application for having the critical weather data you need. Radar data from every operational National Weather Service WSR-88D and FAA Terminal Doppler Weather Radar (TDWR) site is delivered to your phone with products ranging from standard reflectivity to the newest dual-pol variables. Need more? Pull up the latest satellite imagery or warning products with the touch of your screen. With an optional subscription to AllisonHouse.com or CaprockWeather.com, add the display of graphical severe weather outlooks, convective watch boxes, local storm reports, storm tracks, and lightning. Supported by a fantastic user community, PYKL3 Radar is brought to you by a developer with a passion for weather for serious users of radar data. We know Google Play only gives you 15 minutes to evaluate a program before a purchase. That's not nearly enough time to explore the many features and options of PYKL3Radar. So, purchase in confidence! If it does not meet your expectations, just write us back within 24 hours of your purchase and we'll get you refunded. If you have any issues with the program, please contact support@pykl3radar.com We are here to help! PLEASE ENSURE A SOLID, FAST INTERNET CONNECTION WHEN RUNNING THE FIRST TIME as about 10MB of support files are acquired. If you run into issues, please contact us. We can help! Product page and manual: http://www.pykl3radar.com Facebook: http://www.facebook.com/PYKL3Radar Twitter: http:// https://twitter.com/pykl3radar Product support: support@pykl3radar.com

description: Ms. PAC-MAN by Namco is one of the most popular video games in American arcade history! Who can forget the countless hours and quarters spent outrunning ghosts and chomping dots? Re-live the retro action on your device with the queen of the arcades! Move Ms. PAC-MAN with three different control modes! Navigate through the mazes by swiping in the preferred direction or touching the onscreen Directional Pad. Chomp on dots with the swipe of a finger in Swipe Mode. Munch fruits and other items for big points! Chomp all of the dots to advance to the next stage. Go for high scores and high levels! Gain an extra life at 10,000 points! Gobble blinking Power Pellets to weaken ghosts temporarily and eat them up before they change back. Avoid Blinky, the leader of the ghosts, and his fellow ghosts Pinky, Inky and Sue, or you will lose a life. Lose all your lives and it’s game over!

***ATTENTION*** We are aware that some customers are experiencing problems with their in-app purchases not being recognized. We put a button into the game to work around this issue. Please select Help & Options from the Main Menu of the game and use the Restore Transactions button. This should cause the game to recognize your purchase(s). If the button does not appear, please use the Exit Game option on the Main Menu to close the game and then launch it again. This should work to resolve the issue you are experiencing. We apologize for the inconvenience. Puzzle Quest 2 is now available on Android! Escape to a puzzle game fantasy world filled with amazing creatures, powerful weapons, and addictive role playing in this sequel to the award-winning Puzzle Quest. - Experience the ultimate Match 3 puzzle adventure! - Customize your characters with 4 classes in both genders. - Explore an immense and immersive fantasy RPG world! - Explore Verloren for FREE! Purchase the full version for even more adventure! Puzzle Quest 2 supports 800x480, 854x480, 960x540, 1024x600 and 1280x800 screen resolutions. * Some devices may not be supported. ** Requires a SD card storage and 270MB of free space. For more information about this and other games by Namco, please visit www.namcobandaigames.com. For game play related support inquiries please contact http://namcobandaigames.com/support . **GET MORE GREAT NAMCO GAMES!** Isaac Newton’s Gravity, Flight Control, Crush the Castle, and more! Be the first to know! Get inside BANDAI NAMCO Games America Inc. info on great deals, plus the latest game updates, tips & more… VIST US: www. http://www.bandainamcogames.com/ LIKE US: facebook.com/pacman
release_text: v.1.1.8 • Added support for the new Nexus devices

description: You play a hungry worm, who came from the deep of the earth. After a long sleep you are very hungry and you are going to eat everything and everyone. In Prehistoric worm you can control over 6 and more different worms and you can upgrade the abilities of your worm. By upgrading you abilities you can get an higher highscore and maybe you're the best in the world! -Features- -Highly addictive gameplay -different worms/themes -Upgrade your worm to get stronger! -Compare your highscore with your friends or with the world (google+) -Different enemys (Police, SWAT, ...) -Gadgets (Wings, Confetti, Balloons, Gems, ...) -Minigames (Snake 360, Flappy ufo, Blockdodge, more coming soon) -minimalistic oldschool pixel graphics
release_text: New Update! -new worm (Retro worm) -small bug fixed (Mystery boxes) We've just released our new game, you can download it to get some mysteryboxes. We would be happy if you test it :) Thank you so much for playing Prehistoric worm, you are the best!

description: Enjoy entertainment on the go! Watch live and on demand TV - any place on your tablet. With the Rogers Anyplace TV app, you can: • Catch up on primetime TV shows • Stream live Blue Jays baseball • Watch full length movies • Keep the kids entertained with favourite shows from Treehouse, YTV and more • Rogers Digital TV customers – watch shows included in your cable subscription! You can view content over your wireless network or via WiFi connection. You will need a My Rogers profile to get access. Don't have a My Rogers profile? Go to My Rogers at www.rogers.com/myrogers to create one. Your cable and/or wireless account needs to be tied to your My Rogers profile to get access to all your favourite TV shows, live sports, and more. Once you log in, live and on demand programming will be based on your Rogers cable package. If using the Rogers 4G or LTE network, standard data charges apply. Rogers Anyplace TV is available on Android devices with OS versions 3.1 to 5.0. Please visit www.rogers.com/WatchRAPTV for a full list of supported devices. Enjoy great programming wherever you happen to be with Rogers Anyplace TV!
release_text: Support for Android 5.0 Minor bug fixes

description: The Rogers One Number app for your Android phone, lets you talk, text and video chat with family, friends and business contacts using your existing Rogers wireless number. Call or text any Canadian number for free and save your wireless minutes - and can be used on Rogers mobile network or stay connected on Wifi. Setup Call Forward and other calling rules using this app. Call contacts from your mobile address book and synch your mobile contacts to Rogers One Number. Note: The following devices are known to have issues with this app: Samsung Ace IIx; LG Gossip Pro.

Voyager: Grand Tour is a physics puzzle game inspired by one of the most successful scientific missions in human history. Launch the Voyager space probe into the depths of the Solar System, slingshot around planets and through obstacles, and try to achieve a perfect planetary flyby. • Dozens of challenging missions set throughout the Solar System • Journey between beautifully-rendered 3D planets • Experience mission replays from Voyager's point of view • Online leaderboards powered by Google Play Game Services

Keep up to date with the latest news and discussions on Guild Wars 2 Reddit with the GW2 Reddit Reader - pulling straight from Reddit to give you the up-to-date news quick and easy. This app is optimised for low bandwidth and quick reading to make getting the latest news even easier. We’re always improving upon this app and would be happy to hear your feedback in ways to improve the app. Feel free to contact us in Guild Wars 2 (offbow.6328 or being.7928) or email us at harrybartlam@simplyapp.co.uk .
release_text: 2.1 *Fixed crashes when internet connection not found. *Message will appear if an internet connection is not established. *Theme set to black on older devices. 2.0 *Complete Theme change for devices running 3.0 and up (Custom Black and Red). *Donations are now possible. *Corrected a format problem so images are now larger. *Other minor bug fixes (performance and formatting). 1.1 *Fixed next page error *Corrected default text size *Implemented error handling

description: Splitwise is the best way to share bills and IOUs and make sure that everyone gets paid back. Use Splitwise to split household bills with roommates, to figure out costs for a group vacation, or just to remember when a friend spots you for lunch. On the Android, iPhone or the web ( http://splitwise.com ), you can view your balances, track spending trends, set up email reminders for bills, and much much more! "I only wish such a tool had been available when I was a new college graduate..." – Ann Carrns, NYTimes Bucks Blog "Whoa, @split_wise is what we always wanted livewith.us to be. Totally going to use this in my new apt instead of my own software." – @aroldan
release_text: 3.6.5 ★ Group spending summary ★ Enable zoom in on receipts ✓ Improve image handling ☂ Minor tweaks and bug fixes 3.6.4 ☂ Fix a rare crash in add expense split details 3.6 ★ Translate into Spanish We're adding more languages as soon as we can. If you'd like to help us translate, let us know at translations@splitwise.com. Thanks for using Splitwise! If you've got any thoughts or suggestions, please let us know at support@splitwise.com.

description: Be a Spec-Op 24/7. FREE APP AND SERVICE. Try out and customize in depth 52 real-life weapons from Ghost Recon Future Soldier. Includes all pre-order and unlock weapons – giving you over 20 million unique weapons to create. - Use our mobile GunSmith to create your own unique weapon in 3D, all the way down the inner parts - Modify your weapon on the go and sync it to your console or PC* - Includes 52 weapons in Free Mode : ACR, 417, AK47, MP7, Skorpion Evo 3PKP, M118, MP7, M590A, Goblin and many more - precisely modelled down the inner parts (available to everyone) - Post your custom weapon on the GunSmith Gallery or search for any weapon you like - Access your multiplayer stats* - Manage your squad on the go* - Download the app and get 6 free, bonus attachment credits to use in Ghost Recon Future Soldier* * : requires GRFS on console or PC WARNING : before entering Sync Mode or spending any credits, please make sure to purchase a copy of Ghost Recon Future Soldier, put it in your disc tray and link it to your Uplay account. Any changes done before you have put the game in your home platform will be void. More info on http://www.ghostrecon.com/network Future updates will include : - Access your in-game Ghost Feed, with Friend activity and Challenges - Access to Ghost Dossier (persistent persona) and other GR games Check our FAQ at : http://ghostreconnetwork.ubi.com/en-GB/xbox/public/faq Thanks for downloading, and we hope you enjoy this free, BETA app. If you have any feedback, please email us at grnetwork-support@ubisoft.com

The Best Fantasy mmorpg In 2014! Content Rating: Medium Maturity ★★★★★ Join thousands of players and experience the best MMORPG experience on Android: Battle your way through the land of Stilland and discover the secrets of the elemental. Utilize gear refinement, jewel socketing, companions and much more to increase your power to overcome the most difficult enemies. Team up with your friends to take on quests and explore our vast fantasy chaos world, achieve heroic feats and lead your guild to the top of the multiple player leader board. Features: - Epic Storyline! The dragons have awakened from their long dark dreams! And the Elementals are fallen into the dark side. A war is coming! As a human, what will you do? - Stunning Combat! Intensive turn-based battle makes it just like you are watching a movie! - Adventure with Your companions! Giant ogre, mysterious elf, ghost knight, insane mage and more! - Hundreds of Morph cards. Transform as Elves, Orcs, Undead, Titan, Dragon and More! - Explore the world of Stilland solo, or unleash the true multiplayer game experience: Make friends or enemies, duel, communicate and more. A wide range of interactions makes each player a living part of this fantasy universe. - Join a party or guild to become stronger and fight with your teammates to overcome the most challenging part of MMO games: our World Boss. - Take part in epic multiplayer fights and try to lead your guild to the TOP via Guild War THE WORLD IS YOURS Join the best mobile MMORPG, and enter the legend now! Email Support: support@ugamehome.com Facebook Fan Page: https://www.facebook.com/stillandwar

Seamlessly capturing contacts information from business cards in 22 languages, ABBYY Business Card Reader (BCR) is a powerful multi-function contact data management application that makes it effortless to enter and manage your business contacts. ✓ Winner of RISING STAR Award in the “Mobile Field Sales & CRM” category in the Mobile Star Awards ✓ ABBYY BCR is a Featured App in the Intel® Business App Portfolio ✓ If your desk is strewn with printed business cards this could be the app for you. Throw away your 1980s-style rolodex and download the ABBYY Business Card Reader (BCR) - The Telegraph (UK) -------------- With ABBYY Business Card Reader (BCR) you can: - Instantly transfer business card data in 22 languages right onto your smartphone - Sync cards data across different mobile platforms via ABBYY’s cloud storage - Save contacts in the BCR’s own storage – CardHolder- with convenient search, sorting and grouping functionality - Share biz contacts data from BCR via e-mail, SMS or Wi-Fi System requirements: OS Android version 4.0 and above, camera with auto focus. -------------- KEY FEATURES ✓ Forget having to manually enter contact details into your smartphone. Unsurpassed data recognition and speed based on famous ABBYY Mobile OCR technology, eliminate having to correct or re-key business cards data, making creating new contacts easy and automatic. ✓ Sync cards across different mobile platforms via ABBYY’s cloud storage. This will make business cards database trouble-free, updated and accessible from all your mobile devices. ✓ Card Holder, the BCR’s own storage, provides convenient business card search, as well as sorting and grouping of contacts. You can quickly and easily find biz contact you need. ✓ ‘My business cards' group in Card Holder allows to save your own business cards in different languages and for different biz occasions. ✓ Text notes to cards easy to make, edit, look through and find in BCR’s storage. ✓ Quickly verify contacts recognition results. The BCR highlights uncertain characters and displays the original image so that you can confirm or correct the app's output. ✓ Crop automatically cuts off all the background of the business card’s photo, making it looking like a real-life business card in the Card Holder. ✓ Forward recognized contact data from Card Holder via e-mail as VCard and JPEG file or via SMS as a plain text. ✓ Find out more about your new biz contacts on the most popular social networks – Linkedln, Facebook and Twitter right from your BCR! ✓ Search in Maps for the address of your biz contact with just one tap from ABBYY Business Card Reader ✓ Backup and restore contacts from saved business cards. ✓ Recognize business cards in 22 languages, including multilingual cards (maximum 3 languages simultaneously): • Czech • Danish • Dutch • English • Estonian • Finnish • French • German • Greek • Indonesian • Italian • Korean • Norwegian (Bokmal) • Norwegian (Nynorsk) • Polish • Portuguese (Portugal) • Portuguese (Brazil) • Russian • Spanish • Swedish • Turkish • Ukrainian -------------- FOLLOW ABBYY Mobile on Twitter http://twitter.com/ABBYY_Mobile Join ABBYY Mobile on Facebook: http://facebook.com/AbbyyMobile Watch ABBYY Mobile on YouTube http://www.youtube.com/ABBYYHQVIDEOS -------------- ABBYY Business Card Reader makes your business cards and contacts work.
release_text: With the release of Android 6 we rewrote business cards database functions, so the application has become even faster and more reliable, especially on Samsung smartphones. If you like Business Card Reader, please recommend it your friends and leave reviews in the store. Thanks!

description: KABC-TV Los Angeles – Stay on top of the latest breaking news, weather and traffic with the ABC7LA app. It’s the information you need to know in an app that’s fun and easy to use. Get the top local headlines for Los Angeles and Southern California, as well as news from around the U.S. and the world. The app also features the latest entertainment news, as well as more offbeat stories. Best of all, the app is free and gives you unlimited access to a wealth of content you can then easily share with your family and friends on Facebook, Twitter and more. ALERTS & VIDEO: -Breaking news alerts pushed to your home screen -Live breaking news video (with closed captioning) -Live video streams of your local newscasts (when available) -On demand video clips LOCAL WEATHER: -Latest weather data wherever you are -Set and track weather for multiple locations -Latest video forecast from the station -Live Doppler -7-Day & hourly forecasts LOCAL NEWS AND TRAFFIC: -Local and state news headlines -Photo galleries -Interactive traffic map MORE NEWS THAN EVER: -Sports headlines from ESPN -National and world headlines from ABC News -Celebrity news from OnTheRedCarpet.com

description: Travel around the world and partake in the most fascinating holidays and festivals celebrated in different countries! Bon Voyage: Hidden Object Game makes hunting for hidden objects more exciting than ever. Take a grand tour around four continents. Learn incredible facts about the history and origin of the most popular holidays. Gather impressive collections of artifacts and national symbols, which are a mandatory attribute of ancient and modern cultural traditions of humanity. Good luck on your adventure! Features Bon Voyage: Hidden Object Game: ● Get precious collections of cultural artifacts ● Enjoy 3 different hidden object game modes ● Make your way through 90 spectacular locations of hidden objects ● Thousands of hidden objects! ● 5 languages available: English, French, Spanish, German and Russian Encyclopedia of adventures. There are many incredible and captivating holidays in the furthest corners of the Earth you may not know about. Bon Voyage: Hidden Object Game is your chance to get acquainted with cultural and religious phenomena of mankind. In this all-new hidden object adventure you'll witness the beauty of Cherry Blossom in Japan, experience the main events of Scottish Highland games, visit the southeastern cities of Rio de Janeiro to participate in Carnival. Bon Voyage: Hidden Object comprises of 4 level packs. Visit picturesque places of North and South America, Europe and Asia. Every location of hidden objects is devoted to a famous event accompanied by encyclopedic articles which can help you to learn interesting facts and expand your horizons. The game is available in four languages, so it will be interesting to play in word associations and improve your vocabulary of a preferred language. There are 3 modes of difficulty: find hidden objects from the list, look at the silhouette shapes and find items in the picture, enjoy hidden object search by word associations. In order to proceed to the next chapter you need to get a unique collection of artifacts corresponding to the event. Earn various bonuses and see how high you can score in the global leader board. Excellent graphics and music create a festive mood and ignite the spirit of adventure. Bon Voyage!

Screenshot HD is the best app to take a screenshot of your Android phone's screen with the best possible quality. It can capture in full screen mode your games, videos, apps, photos, etc. You need to have ROOT ACCESS to use it. Features - Click the camera button to capture the screen - Shake your phone to get a screenshot - You can configure the delay time of the capture - Play a sound taking a screenshot. - Show notifications after the screenshots The screenshots are saved in the folder: /SDCARD/Screenshots * This application works with ROOTED DEVICES.

Spray Can emulate a spray to paint your car, a wall, your friend, your house and everything that you want. Shake your Android phone and start to paint with Spray Can. You can joke your friends with this app. You just need to touch the screen after shaking your phone.

Configure and upgrade Actiontec ScreenBeam receivers wirelessly with this utility. You can check for updates, modify the display language, as well as set other parameters with this all-in-one configuration tool. This utility is for ScreenBeam Pro, ScreenBeam Mini, and ScreenBeam Mini2 receivers only. It is not compatible with ScreenBeam Education Editions and ScreenBeam Business Edition receivers. Features: Detects and downloads the latest firmware for Actiontec ScreenBeam products. Provides system configurations for Actiontec ScreenBeam products. Provides various power management options for Actiontec ScreenBeam receivers .
release_text: 1. Click Back key one more time to exit in main menu. 2. Do not show Android Utility Logo in Running Task List 3. Add a new Mac filter condition "12:9f:a9:"

description: Download the Skogman Realty app and discover a variety of different search options and filters, making it easier than ever to search for homes on-the-go in a variety of areas servicing Cedar Rapids and the surrounding areas. Areas of expertise include the following: Corridor, Cedar Rapids, and Iowa City. ________ Version 3 has arrived! We reviewed your feedback and vigorously tested to come up with our best release to date. We improved our back-end system to make searching for your next dream home easier and faster than ever. Next, we simplified our design and created a layout optimized for your home searching experience. Upgrades to the new version includes: Map Pins: Consistent with the new web map search, we color coded the map pins based on property status. Map Callout: Redesigned this to highlight property photos and maintain consistency with our list view. POI Data: Added in the ability to see places of interest while you search for your next home. List View: Updated the look of our list view page to highlight property photos. We also added the ability to lazy load property results as the users scrolls down the list. Property Details: Redesigned this page to achieve a cleaner look including a reorganization of the property’s features. Help Menu: Created a more descriptive and fluent help menu for our apps. We have also added helpful suggestions within the app as the user navigates around. Account/Menu: Restructured this section to focus more on the user’s account information. It provides live location of buses, arrival predictions, and other important bus route information. The app works for transit agency of all types including: city/municipal transit college/university transit hotel/resorts shuttles airport shuttles corporate shuttles Contact us to add your transit organization. www.ride-systems.com

description: Simple child learning games. It is great for children 1 to 6. Free & No Ads! The "Learn the Letters" game allows users to browse through the alphabet and your child should try to figure out what each letter is. This game is ideal for kids 1 to 4. The "Learn the Numbers" game allows users to browse through the alphabet and your child should try to figure out what each letter is. This game is ideal for kids 1 to 4. The "Picture Book" game shows pictures with the name of the picture written below it. This could be used for younger kids (1 to 2) to recognize the picture or for older kids (3-6) to spell out the words. The "Spelling Bee" game displays words for children 3-6 to try to spell out. The "What's The Time?" game displays an analog clock with different times for children to figure out what time the clock represents. This application is new and there will be new games added to it all the time! http://www.8d8apps.com/
release_text: Sounds and Interactions were added throughout the app!

description: Its not Angry Bird, its not Clumsy Bird and not even Flappy Bird. Ages have passed of all birds and now the bird is dead. It' called 'Dead Bird'. Dead Bird needs your help to cross the obstacles and go as far as possible but the level of difficulty makes it a CHALLENGE for the bird to cross without hitting and remain alive. The 8 bit retro look reminds you of old days from 80's when we were fond of such game consoles. The UNBEATEN CHALLENGE is simple just to cross the first three levels of difficulty.

Spring flowering trees that gently sway while petals fly in the air carried by the wind. Clouds and the sun move over the sky that shifts color dynamically according to the time of day. As the night slowly falls the moon appears clearer and clearer until fully visible at midnight. The day starts with a dazzling sunrise around 6 am by the lower left corner and ends with a magnificent sunset in the other corner around 6 pm. While the free version is beautiful, ad-free and fully functional, many settings are locked. The full version is highly customizable: - select background (rape field, mount fuji or meadow) - select foreground flowers - select flower count - select tree (pink sakura, white cherry tree or magnolia) - set tree size - set ground level - set number of petals - set petal size - set any time of day (colors and light change) - or use dynamic real time mode - set sunrise time - set sunset time - option to use GPS once a day to determine location and automatically calculate sunrise and sunset times, in order to make the sun move similar to the real sun in your location - change wind speed - set star count - set night sky brightness - set night light intensity - set position and size of the moon - set rotation speed of the sun - show/hide the sun - show/hide high clouds - show/hide low clouds - toggle silhouette mode - use true color (24 bit) This live wallpaper is OpenGL based. This means that animations and graphics will flow much smother than if it was using the CPU. It also means that the phone's CPU is not working, giving much less impact on overall phone performance. The wallpaper is only active when visible, so battery consumption is very insignificant. Photo credits (flickr users) Magnolia: Tom Brandt Sakura: gardener41 Cherry Tree: gardener41 Meadow: Nicholas_T Daffodils: Mark Robinson Grass: Maja Dumat Rape field: Maja Dumat Mount Fuji: IvanWalsh.com Moon: Luis Argerich Thanks for the creative commons licenses!
release_text: new setting: presets & personal saved settings

description: A wonderful landscape covered in pure white snow. Pine trees sway and snowflakes slowly fall from the sky. The free version is - as always - ad free, beautiful and fully functional but most settings are locked. The full version has loads of settings including the dynamic real time mode where lights, sun, moon, stars, colors, clouds changes according to the time of day. You can also set fog density, snowflake count, tree count, tree size, snowflake size, snowflake shape, select different backgrounds, change the ground level, change snowflake weight (make them fall faster/slower)... And much more. Contributors Flickr.com: Trees: Frank Kovalchek & Newton-Syms Mountains: Zach Dischner Forest: mahalie stackpole Moon: Luis Argerich public-domain-image.com: Snow on cypress tree by Rosendahl

Wind turbines slowly turning in the wind, out on a field. 100% ad free (check permissions)! Free version is beautiful and fully functional but most settings are locked. All settings, including the dynamic real time mode, are unlocked in the full version.

The galaxy is at war! Battle Station X is under attack and only you and your brave friends in the Omega Squad can defend the space station from the evil aliens. Download Omega Man Pixel: Battle Station X Run today! Armed with your laser, become a hero to save the day.
