Play for FREE now!

CureIt app has a huge collection of health tips and home remedies. With more than 2000+ home remedies , CureIt mainly focuses on various health benefits derived from Indian herbs and spices. These come handy for relief of simple ailments like headache, back pain or acidity etc. All the information has been organized and cataloged, so you can relate the remedies to the proper ailments. CureIt comes with the below list of features 1. You can Browse the ailments list and get remedies from each of them. 2. Find the list of herbs or spices used, instructions for each remedy along with previous user comments, likes and dislikes. 3. Search remedies by ailment name or keywords in the remedy description. 4. Organize your favorite remedies in My Favorites. 5. Checkout Community section to figure out what others do in CureIt App. 6. Like and Dislike remedies. 7. You can provide your suggestions, by Adding Comments to an remedy. 7. Share remedies with your friends. 8. Quick from my Kitchen feature helps you to find out the matching remedies with the stuff you have in Kitchen. Disclaimer: CureIt app only has remedies derived from Naturally sources like Spices, Plants and Vegetables etc. CureIt app also has some references to Ayurvedha, Homeopathy etc. Remedies and Health tips contained here are not intended as a substitute for consulting with your physician or health care provider. Readers are advised to consult with their doctor about recommendations for supplements and dosages. We shall not be liable or responsible for any loss, injury or damage that may arise from any information or suggestions on this app.

Corruption is everywhere! Angry Citizens let's you guide a group of brave angry people that will peacefully denounce the corruption in their way. Don't let politicians trick you with their promises, employers intimidate you with their layoffs or bankers bribe you with their money envelopes! Scream your slogans and fight for your rights! Angry Citizens is a fictitious game inspired by the social movements that fight against the injustice and corruption in Spain, like 15M, Citizen Tides, Occupy the Congress and Stop Evictions (More information about this movements in-game). We hope you enjoy this "fictitious" game. A Digital Tree

How many balloons can you handle? Challenge your friends to handle more than you! Balloon Challenge is a beautiful game: from time to time a new lovely balloon appears and floats around, your objective is to keep as many as possible floating around at the same time. They also smile and seem happy most of the time. So far, so good... The problem is that all balloons are losing air, something that for some reason makes them sad and, if one of those lovely balloons loses all the air, the game is over! Fortunately you are there to help them, your task is to inflate the balloons and make them happy. Touch the balloons to inflate them before they run out of air but, take care, if you inflate them too much they will explode! For some reason they also don't like exploding... if one of those lovely balloons explodes, the game is over too! You will find out that this is not an easy game, but you will have lots of fun with it... Eventually, you will love/hate that balloons. After finishing each game you will be able to share your balloons with your friends, your score will be the max number of balloons you managed to have at the same time. You can share your game screen with your friends by e-mail, Facebook, Twitter, Whatsapp or with any other social app. Balloon challenge uses internet permissions for AdMob, write external storage to save the game images when you share them and licensing permission to check if the app was installed from Google Play Store. Love it, hate it? Let us know! We hope you enjoy this game. A Digital Tree @adigitaltree

Know exactly how many calories you need each day for a healthy life. Based on the Harris–Benedict equation, Daily Calories can calculate the exact calories for all profiles (athletes, pregnant women, children, ...) and for any goal (lose, maintain or gain weight) helping you live a more healthy, balanced life. Daily Calories will give you a fully customized result just for you. Daily Calories also calculates other nutritional factors, like the body-mass index (BMI) and shows the calories suggested for your diet and for each meal of the day. Daily Calories stores your nutritional information on the device so you can check your calories anytime. We don't send that information anywhere, it's safe on your device. Daily Calories uses internet permissions for admob... no other "weird" permissions required! We hope you enjoy this app. A Digital Tree @adigitaltree

Fingers 4 Kids is an educational game aimed to help children in the process of learning colors, numbers and letters. Fingers 4 Kids has no adds and is free. We don't like showing ads to children, call us weird... We would like to thank Jason Weinberger & wcfsymphony, and freemusicarchive.org, for the game music (Debussy - Printemps, II. Modéré). Special thanks to Ire for her support and Jimmy for the inspiration. Fingers 4 Kids don't use any special permission... seriously! Hope your kids enjoy the game, feedback will be appreciated. A Digital Tree @adigitaltree

Lantern enlighten your life with your phone camera's flashlight. Just touch the buttons to turn on your camera's flashlight or switch screen background to white! Lantern also includes a home screen widget for faster access, just touch it to turn on and off the camera's flashlight! Lantern uses internet permissions for admob, and camera permissions to turn on and off the flashlight... no "weird" permissions required! We hope you enjoy this app. A Digital Tree @adigitaltree

Mirror Selfie is a simple and free mirror app that also allows to take and share photos. Use the front camera to see yourself on the screen, touch the screen to take a photo, push the share button and send it to your friends... that simple. Mirror uses internet permissions for admob, camera permissions to use the cameras and write external storage to save the photos... no "weird" permissions required! We hope you enjoy this app. A Digital Tree @adigitaltree

Do you usually collect information on the go and, when you finish, have to use it on your computer or send it to others? Would you like to structure your media contents in a document way? Reports Assistant is for you. Reports Assistant allows you to create documents with the information on your mobile phone. Your reports will be composed of customized items such as: - Texts, write or just dictate them. - Images, use the images on your phone or take a photo. - Videos, use the videos on your phone or record one. - Audio, use the sounds on your phone or record them. - Dates. After finishing your reports, you can: - Send them by email with all the media attached. - Create a ZIP archive and upload it to your favorite cloud storage. Your report will contain all the files you included, which makes it a perfect tool to collect information on the go! If you miss any type of information for your reports, just send us an e-mail and we will include it in future versions. Internet permissions are required for AdMob. Record audio and write to external storage permissions are required to record the media data for the reports. Love it, hate it? Just let us know! (adigitaltree.online @ gmail.com) We hope you enjoy this app. A Digital Tree @adigitaltree

Play chess online with your friends! Meet new friends with onChess! With onChess you can play chess games with your friends, anywhere and anytime. Invite your friends, make your moves, review your finished games, and your friends' too! Create a full profile or register as an anonymous player and begin playing... and if you like onChess, upgrade your anonymous profile anytime! Of course, both kinds of profiles are free. Meet new opponents and invite them, or make your profile public and receive invitations from people around the world. Full profiles can change their public status anytime, anonymous profiles will always be public. onChess will fill your opponents contact list with: - Your registered phone contacts (only the phone ones, we don't use the SIM card contacts). - Anyone that have sent you an invitation you have accepted. - Anyone you have invited that have accepted the invitation. The more you play, the more opponents you will have for choosing! onChess will instantly send and notify all your invitations and moves to your opponents. You can also chat while playing, and share your results on social networks or by e-mail. FEATURES: - Online chess games with friends. - Multiplayer chess games with other people around the world. - Review your opponents profiles and last played games. - Create a full profile or play anonymous. Upgrade your anonymous profile for free anytime. - Become public and receive invitations from people around the world. If you have a full profile and get tired, make yourself private again, anytime. Anonymous profiles will always be public. - Block invitations from contacts, in case you need a rest... - In game chat, only available for full profiles. - Review finished games and learn from your mistakes, and your opponents'. - Share your games. To avoid cheating, only finished games are available for sharing. - Educational and easy to use. - It's free! GAME EXPIRATION: All games without activity in one week will expire: - Invitations will expire after a week without answer. Pending invitations will be rejected. - Games in progress will expire after a day, a week or a month without moves, depending on the game mode. The player who should have moved will abandon and lose the game. HARDCORE PLAYERS: You can play onChess in a casual or hardcore way, you decide. As a suggestion: if you are a hardcore player and want to play with other hardcore players, please add a plus character "+" before your nickname. If you experience any problem, or are already registered with a full profile and want to change your nick, clear the onChess game data and register again using the same phone number, all your games will synchronize with the server data (only for full profiles). PERMISSIONS: - android.permission.ACCESS_NETWORK_STATE. Used to check internet connection. - android.permission.INTERNET. Used to communicate with the game servers. - android.permission.READ_CONTACTS. Used to search for registered contacts. - android.permission.WRITE_EXTERNAL_STORAGE. Used to store the contact images. Other permissions required by GCM (push): - com.google.android.c2dm.permission.RECEIVE - android.permission.GET_ACCOUNTS - android.permission.WAKE_LOCK OTHER: onChess uses GCM push messages. To work properly, onChess must be installed in the internal memory and always running... take care with task killers! We love to hear from our players. If you have an idea that can make onChess better, anything you don't like or just want to drop us a message, send us an e-mail... your opinion matters! And if you like (or don't... sigh) onChess, please make a review! We hope you enjoy the game. A Digital Tree @adigitaltree

description: EMPLOYEES Please use the "ADP Mobile Solutions" app instead of this one. OWNERS AND PAYROLL ADMINISTRATORS The RUN Powered by ADP® Mobile Payroll app is a new convenient way to help you manage your payroll anytime, anywhere on your Android™ device. It is a fast, intuitive, and secure mobile version of RUN Powered by ADP -- the industry-leading full-service online payroll solution that PC Magazine called “exceedingly simple to understand and use.”* Available for current RUN Powered by ADP clients**, you can pay hourly and salaried employees as well as contractors while you are on the go. Use our patent-pending, easy to use interface to quickly enter and review pay data for processing your payrolls. Manage your employees more effectively using the HR Checkup and HR Dictionary. KEY FEATURES: - Pay employees and contractors using pre-defined pay rates - Pay different pay rates to employees who perform more than one job - Distribute pay to different departments - Calculate employee earnings and deductions - Preview payroll totals and cash requirements - Calculate federal, state, and local taxes - Change check dates - Enter vacation, sick and personal time - View employee contact, photo, and payroll information - View reports for employee and company payroll information ADDITIONAL HR FEATURES: - Assess how your HR practices stack up to best practices by topic with an HR Checkup - Access a dictionary with over 600 HR and payroll terms and definitions - View weekly HR Tips SECURITY: - Private information is not stored on the device - Account number information is never transmitted - All transactions are routed through ADP's secure servers - Login sessions time out from inactivity - Account is locked out with excessive login failures REQUIREMENTS: - Android OS version 2.1 or later - WiFi or 3G Internet connection - User ID and password is required to access the payroll functions (RUN Powered by ADP US clients only) - No User ID is required to use the HR Checkup and HR Dictionary LEARN MORE: Are you a RUN Powered by ADP client? Download the app and try the demo. Or contact your ADP customer service center. © 2012-2014 ADP, LLC. ADP and the ADP Logo are registered trademarks of ADP, LLC. RUN Powered by ADP is a registered service mark of ADP, LLC. Android is a trademark of Google Inc. All other trademarks and services marks are the property of their respective owners. **Not an ADP client? Visit smallbusiness.adp.com or Call 1-800-CALL-ADP *Source: PC Magazine, June 2007
release_text: Fix specifically for Samsung S5 Lollipop users that were unable to login to the app after upgrading from KitKat.

description: This rangefinder(telemeter) measures the Distance to a target by the camera perspective. The effective distance is 10m-1km. To measure the distance, you should know the height(width) of a target. Don't worry!! Man's height is 1.7m(5.6ft), a golf flag is 7ft, a bus is 3.2m(10.5ft), a door is 2.1m(7ft). With that, we can guess the height of almost everything. It can be very useful to golfers. Usage is simple: Input the height of the target, and touch the screen. If the target is aligned by 2 lines, get the measured distance.

SPL(sound pressure level) meter app uses your built-in microphone to measure noise volume. We had calibrated many android devices with the actual sound level meter with dB(A). REMEMBER!! The smart phone microphones were aligned to human voice (300-3400Hz, 40-60dB). Therefore the maximum values are LIMITED by the hardware limitation, and very loud sound(100+ db) cannot be recognized. Moto Droid (max.100), Galaxy S3 (81dB), Galaxy Note (91dB), Galaxy S2 (98dB), HTC Desire(82dB)... Vibrometer app uses the phone sensors to measure vibration or the earthquake, and it shows a reference as a seism detector. The measured values are the Modified Mercalli Intensity scale(MMI), and just for reference.

The world’s newest, most addicting word game is right here! Word Winder is the brain child of America’s most syndicated puzzle maker, David L. Hoyt (Daily Jumble™, Word Roundup™, & many others). Word Winder offers six amazing and totally original games in a single app! Play by yourself and choose one of four different puzzle games – every puzzle is hand crafted by David L. Hoyt. Play together with friends and family (pass-and-play) in your choice of multi-player modes. The game plays just like the hot new Word Winder board game. It's a game of strategy and cunning, offense and defense, forming alliances and outwitting opponents. The 6 entirely original games are: ✓ Word Winder Finder – Find winding answers to crossword style clues. ✓ Word Winder Frenzy – Find words of different lengths winding through the grid. Race the clock! ✓ Word Winder Challenge – Locate the best winding line of words. Beat the David Hoyt score! ✓ Word Roundup Frenzy – Bonus traditional word find puzzles - a David L. Hoyt hit on the Internet for years! ✓ Word Winder Multi-Player (2 or 3 player) – The hit board game. Play it here as pass-and-play. ✓ Word Winder Multi-Player Speed (2 or 3 player) – Each player has a separate countdown clock! Other features of Word Winder include: ✩ 20 Free Puzzles to get you started (5 each of 4 types) ✩ 31 Days of Unlimited Play of pass-and-play Multi-player ✩ Great for Kids ages 9 and up ✩ Optimized for Android Phone screens. ✩ Tracks your High Scores & Best Times ✩ Progress in all games/puzzles automatically saved ✩ Hundreds and hundreds of additional puzzles in Collections! ✩ Look up any word in Merriam-Webster's online dictionary Word Winder is the game of winding words from the Man Who Puzzles America (David L. Hoyt) -- the game which has created a huge audience of amazingly dedicated fans! Try Word Winder today. ✩✩✩✩ REVIEWS ✩✩✩✩ ". . . the most addictive, challenging and entertaining word game app that I have ever played! - iPhone Mom "If you’re a fan of crosswords, word finds, jumbles and similar word games, then Word Winder is a must have." -- AppCraver "If you’re a word game enthusiast, and love playing Scrabble, Lexuluos, or crossword puzzles, it’s time to put your word skills to the test with Word Winder." -- Game400.com Keywords: word, find, wind, board, winding, mind, mind games, word games, multiplayer, friends, kids, learn, family, Hoyt

description: We released "Anygram", new brand of "AnyTalk". Download "Anygram" please. Do you want to learn a foreign language and culture ? If so, you can meet native speakers around the world and be friends. Now you can easily make foreign friends. AnyTalk provides auto-translation chatting and language exchange. AnyTalk is a global social network service that provides you opportunities to meet people from all over the world no matter which language you speak or which country you are from. It is a service that help you learn foreign languages from native speakers and also let you talk freely with foreign friends by using a translator. AnyTalk Translator is available in more than 80 languages and make chatting with foreign friends easier. It is a service that gives you the opportunity to learn new languages from a lot of people at the same time. Once you write a sentence in the language that you intend to learn, there will be many native speakers who will be able to make corrections on your grammar for free. If you make a correction on other users’ posts, you can get points and gifts. From now on, you can share your ideas and experiences with people from all over the world through AnyTalk.
release_text: - Story share - Improvement of chatting speed - Some bugs fixed

description: Inventario is a simple program to help the construction of the warehouse inventory. Inventory operation is summarized in these simple steps: 1. Imports data from your products 2. Take the camera of the device to scan and store products indicating the stock units (if you prefer you can indicate the stock manually). 3. After the inventory, you can print it, revise it and send it back to your program or ERP business management. The import / export process is done via CSV text files that you can generate with your ERP bussiness software or with any spreadsheet like excel. To use the camera as a barcode reader you must have installed the application "Barcode Scanner" de Zxing Team, that you can download free from the Android Market.
release_text: * Management of multiple inventories (companies, warehouses ...) * New fields: price and amount for obtaining valued inventories * Introduction of products by voice. * Take and store pictures for each item.

description: Astonishing Comic Reader is a next-gen comic reader full of stunning features! With an elegant and simple interface, this app allows you to browse and read all your comics on your device. Reading a comic has never been so easy, thanks to a simple navigation system and a powerful zoom feature. Organize all your comics in customizable collections, or use the powerful search feature to find what to read. Use the intelligent suggestions system to quickly fill your collections with related comics, or jump directly to the next issue when you have finished to read one. Synchronize your collections, favorites and statistics with the heroic account, and never lose your data again! Astonishing Comic Reader is able to generate awesome wallpapers if you're using Muzei app, and have a Cast support, so you can read your comics everywhere, on any screen! Discover Snapshots, an amazing way to store and share all moments parts you love in your comics. And thanks to our synchronization system, you can get your comics from your Cloud storage provider! Add the comics you like to your favorites list, and share the pages which amazed you the most with your friends in a few touches! It's that easy to use! Astonishing Comic Reader is fully compatible with CBZ and CBR comics! And it's ad free! Join our community on G+: https://plus.google.com/communities/113176077772826564350 Feel free to send any suggestions or feedback you may have heroic reader! If you're wondering which is the comic used in the screenshots, go checkout the Misery Depot project on http://www.miserydepot.com/ . Other images are from golden age comics in public domain
release_text: Brand new icon Persistant sort Metadata suggestions A lot of bug fixes New animations

description: The West Texas Mesonet app let's you view the current and past 24 hour weather data collected by the Texas Tech University, West Texas Mesonet array of weather stations ( http://www.mesonet.ttu.edu/ ). The app allows users to: - Quickly find and add your favorite stations to your list by typing in the station or nearby city name - View current meteorological conditions of your saved stations in list view - Tapping on a station displays detailed meteorological data and also gives access to the Mesonet plots and the NWS forecast page for that location (swipe left/right to change these pages) - Dual pane view for Nexus 7 and larger tablets when the device is in landscape orientation Note that this app does not include a background timer to check periodically for new data. Station source data is updated and made available every 5-8 minutes. When the user navigates from a detail data view back to the list view, or changes the device orientation, the app will only download the latest set of data if 8 minutes or more has passed since the last data download. The user can always force a data download by pressing the refresh button. IMPORTANT NOTE The TTU West Texas Mesonet team graciously makes the meteorological data available, but IS NOT responsible for this app. Any feedback, problems, bug, or feature request must be made via the Feedback button in the app menu or using the contact email on this page. Thank you. Special thanks to the Mesonet team at Texas Tech University and NWS Lubbock for making this project happen.
release_text: Version 1.3, Build 36: Added Clyde, Dell City, Snyder South stations. Version 1.3, Build 34: Bug fix. If app crashes under Android M Preview, please submit a bug report. Thanks!

description: Aesop Systems Task Manager emphasizes beauty and functionality. A widget for quickly speeding up your sluggish phone or for checking available RAM as well as a easy to use interface that can be learned in seconds.

"The Defense" is a classic tower defense game with a focus on creating upgrade tactics to develop the best pitch to make it as hard as possible for the monsters to reach the gates of the castle. The towers can be tuned in a number of attributes up to 25 times. The levels are alternating between normal, bonus, air and boss rounds which all requiring a special tactic. An additional aspect is the world highscore list, that makes it possible to compete with players around the world or friends. Features: * World-Highscore List * Up to 100 Levels with over 60 Unique Monsters * Free placement of towers * Tower Tuning up to 25 times * Bonus, Air & Boss Levels TIP: Try to build Rifle Towers and Canon Towers first !

The AFA Action Voter Guide (AFAAction.net) is the most distinctive and comprehensive presentation of information on candidates available at one location for values voters. Every individual voter can visit type in his or her address and be presented with their candidates and information that will assist the voter in determining who will best represent their Christian values if elected to public office. The guide was developed from a group of panelists selected for their conservative credentials and belief in constitutional government, free enterprise, strong national defense, and traditional Judeo-Christian values, such as the sanctity of life and marriage. After evaluating the data, panelists assigned a grade indicating what kind of voting record that candidate, if elected, would likely receive from a multi-issue conservative organization that grades on economic and social issues. The source data is provided so voters can more easily make their own evaluation. AFA Action’s unique voter guide has several distinctions and features: · Economic/social conservative grades (A to F) or a voter’s specific candidates · Vote ratings of federal legislators from conservative and liberal organizations · Donations of significance made by the candidates and to the candidates · Endorsements of candidates by conservative and liberal organizations · Surveys of candidates on issues, role of government, background and beliefs

آفات اللسان هو رائعة من روائع الدكتور عمر عبد الكافي. يحتوي التطبيق علي الكثير من الدروس المهمة مثل : خطورة اللسان الغيبة النميمة المراء والجدال نكران النعمة الكلام في ما لا يعني كثرة الشكوى الكذب الافتراء الأذى باللسان و غيرهم الكثير من المواضيع الشيقة.يمكنك الأستماع مباشرة من الأنترنت أو تحميل السور علي الجهاز و سوف يستعرضها البرنامج تلقائياْ بدون الحاجة للأتصال بالأنترنت..أتمنى من الجميع تحميل هذا التطبيق الإسلامي الجميل والرائع ولاتترددوا بالتبليغ ونشر هذا التطبيق للجميع والدال على الخير كفاعله وتقبل الله منا ومنكم صالح الأعمال والسلام عليكم ورحمة الله وبركاته.من فضلك قم بتقييم التطبيق إذا أعجبك المحتوي

Power Affirmation Apps Condition Your Subconscious Mind With The Repetition Of Automatic Positive Thought. We all know that the way we think is very important. Thoughts can easily become self-fulfilling. Thoughts create feelings. Feelings create actions. Actions create results. That the kind of results we obtain in life often stem from our thoughts. If for whatever reason we have somehow acquired a negative mindset or thought pattern about someone or something it can be very difficult to change. Wouldn't it be great if we could simply reprogram our mind to be more positive and empowered. One great way to do this is by repeating positive empowering affirmations on a regular basis - thereby replacing our old thought habits with new ones. But who has the time to constantly repeat affirmations to themselves let alone the will-power to remember to do so. Imagine there was a simple app that could do this for you. Through a simple set and forget alarm clock type function you could go about your daily activities sure in the knowledge that you will get your daily prescribed dose of life changing audio affirmations. Now you can! By simply setting the times when you wish to have your power audio affirmations broadcast back to you, these audio affirmations will be played back automatically. Also, because they are set to play at prescribed times, after a while they simply melt into the background creating a truly subliminal effect, installing powerful new ways of thinking below the threshold of your conscious awareness. Specially formulated to be listened to at bedtime or whilst asleep these power affirmations will gently coax your mind away from the negative blocks that bind you and slowly liberate your true life force to be and achieve all that you can be. There is no other time like NOW and your choice will create your future. Commit to change and begin the incredible journey to a new you.

description: Light Meter of AFS software is to measure illuminance in Lux using the light sensor of your smartphone or tablet. In addition to a digital display of the light intensity in lux, lux meter on the display of two analog instruments. A linear display and a circular display. The scale can be adjusted, this is in accordance with the meaningful display. In addition, the maximum and the minimum value is displayed. To increase the accuracy of a calibration factor can be set. Lux Meter provides all the light sensors of your device ready for measurement, these are displayed accordingly and are Selectable if your device has multiple sensors. Tags: Lux, lux meter, light meter, light meter, lux sensor, photo light, photo exposure, light sensor, exposure
